local: 冷却器内的流体将失去温度。

en: Heat sink type cooler for fluid.
Place the port inside of an enclosed volume to connect to that volume, or outside of the vehicle to connect to the exterior.
local: 将端口放在封闭卷的内部以连接收到该卷，或放在载具外部以连接收到外部。

en: Port used to allow fluid in and out of a fluid system.
local: 允许流体进出流体系统的端口。

en: Allows fluid to flow in and out of an enclosed volume or the exterior.
local: 允许流体进出封闭的体积或外部。

en: Measures the fluid pressure in the connected fluid network.
local: 测量连接的流体网络中的流体压力。

en: A sensor for reading fluid pressure.
local: 用于读取流体压力的传感器。

en: Fluid to measure the pressure of.
The pressure reading of the fluid.
Fluid inside the cooler will lose temperature.
local: 冷却器内的流体将失去温度。

en: Fluid inside the cooler will lose temperature, supplying electric for the fan will increase the rate of exchange.
local: 散热器中的液体能够缓慢降低温度，给风扇供电能够加速这一过程。

en: Fluid inside the cooler will lose temperature, supplying electric for the fan will increase the rate of exchange.
local: 散热器中的液体能够缓慢降低温度，给风扇供电能够加速这一过程。

en: The tank fill spawn full of the selected fluid type.
local: 油箱充满所选流体类型。

en: The fluid connection for the stored contents.
The amount of fluid in the tank in litres.
local: 油箱中的流体量，单位为升。

en: The tank fill spawn full of the selected fluid type.
local: 油箱充满所选流体类型。

en: The fluid connection for the stored contents.
The amount of fluid in the tank in litres.
local: 油箱中的流体量，单位为升。

en: The tank fill spawn full of the selected fluid type.
local: 油箱充满所选流体类型。

en: The fluid connection for the stored contents.
The amount of fluid in the tank in litres.
local: 油箱中的流体量，单位为升。

en: Allows fluid to move from the input side of the valve to the output but resists fluid flow in the other direction.
local: 允许流体从阀门的输入侧移动到输出端，但阻止流体朝另一个方向流动。

en: A one way valve for controlling fluid flow.
local: 控制流体流动的单向阀。

en: Fluid connection for the valve input.
Fluid connection for the valve output.
Controls flow from one side of the valve to the other. Fluid can flow in both directions.
local: 控制从阀门一侧到另一侧的流量。流体可以双向流动。

en: Fluid input connection for the valve.
Fluid output connection for the valve.
Valve gate control for opening and closing the valve.
local: 用于打开和关闭阀门的闸门控制。

en: Controls flow from one side of the valve to the other. Fluid can flow in both directions.
local: 控制从阀门一侧到另一侧的流量。流体可以双向流动。

en: Fluid input connection for the valve.
Fluid output connection for the valve.
Valve gate control for opening and closing the valve.
local: 用于打开和关闭阀门的闸门控制。

en: It has an audible range of 500m.
A ship's foghorn that will sound when receiving an on signal.
local: 船上的雾号，当收到接通信号时会响。

en: Sounds the horn when recieving an on signal.
local: 收到接通信号时按喇叭。

en: The output will only be switched on if both inputs are on.
local: 只有当两个输入都打开时，输出才会打开。

en: A logic gate that outputs the logical AND of two input signals.
local: 一种逻辑门，输出两个输入信号的逻辑和。

en: The first value to perform the logical AND on.
local: 执行逻辑与的第一个值。

en: The second value to perform the logical AND on.
local: 执行逻辑与的第二个值。

en: Outputs an on signal when both A and B are on, and an off signal if either one is off.
local: 当A和B都打开时，输出一个打开信号；当其中一个关闭时，输出一个关闭信号。

en: You can set the duration that the signal should stay on and off for by selecting it with the select tool. A control signal determines whether or not the blinker should output anything. If the control signal is off, the blinker's output will be off. The internal blink timer is reset every time the control signal is switched off.
local: 通过使用选择工具选择信号，可以设置信号应保持打开和关闭的持续时间。控制信号决定闪光灯是否应该输出任何东西。如果控制信号关闭，则闪烁器的输出将关闭。每次关闭控制信号时，内部闪烁计时器都会重置。

en: The blinker outputs a value that blinks between on and off at a set rate.
local: 闪烁器输出一个在开和关之间以设定速率闪烁的值。

en: Controls whether or not the blinker should output anything at all.
local: 控制闪光灯是否应输出任何内容。

en: Outputs a signal that blinks between on and off at the set rate when the control signal is on. Outputs off if the control signal is off.
local: 当控制信号打开时，输出一个在开和关之间以设定速率闪烁的信号。如果控制信号关闭，则输出关闭。

en: The charge and discharge times can be configured by selecting this component with the select tool. Once charged, inputting a new signal will reset the discharge timer.
local: 充电和放电时间可通过使用选择工具选择该部件进行配置。一旦充电，输入一个新的信号将重置放电计时器。\n（译者注：电容通过设置充电时间x和放电时间y来实现信号延时。ON信号会在触发后x秒后才发送给连接的逻辑节点，OFF信号会在触发后y秒后再发送给连接的逻辑节点。）

en: Charges up when receiving an on signal, then discharges over a period of time.
local: 接收到接通信号时充电，然后在一段时间内放电。

en: Charges the capacitor when on, discharges when off.
local: 打开时给电容器充电，关闭时放电。

en: This is useful for creating logic circuits that are permanently switched on.
local: 这对于创建永久打开的逻辑电路很有用。

en: A simple logic component that continuously outputs an on signal.
local: 一种连续输出接通信号的简单逻辑元件。

en: The delay time can be configured by selecting the component with the select tool. The internal delay timer is reset whenever the input signal changes.
local: 延迟时间可以通过使用选择工具选择组件来配置。当输入信号改变时，内部延迟定时器复位。

en: This component stores an input on/off signal, and then outputs it after a delay.
local: 该部件存储输入开/关信号，然后在延迟后输出。

en: Can be an on or off signal. Changing this will reset the delay's timer.
local: 可以是开或关信号。更改此设置将重置延迟计时器。

en: The input signal that has been delayed.
The output will always be the opposite of the input.
A logic gate that outputs the logical NOT of its input signal.
local: 一种逻辑门，输出输入信号的逻辑非。

en: The logical NOT of input A. This output will always be the opposite of the input.
local: 输入A的逻辑非。这个输出总是与输入相反。

en: The output will be switched on if either of the inputs is on, and off if neither are on.
local: 如果其中一个输入打开，则输出将打开；如果两个输入都不打开，则输出将关闭。

en: A logic gate that outputs the logical OR of two input signals.
local: 输出两个输入信号的逻辑或的逻辑门。

en: The first value to perform the logical OR on.
local: 执行逻辑或的第一个值。

en: The second value to perform the logical OR on.
local: 执行逻辑或的第二个值。

en: Outputs an on signal when either A or B are on, and an off signal if neither are on.
local: 当A或B接通时，输出接通信号；当两者都不接通时，输出断开信号。

en: The output will be switched on if only one of the signals are on. The output will be switched off if the two signals are the same.
local: 如果只有一个信号打开，则输出将打开。如果两个信号相同，则输出将关闭。

en: A logic gate that outputs the logical XOR of two input signals.
local: 一种逻辑门，输出两个输入信号的逻辑异或。

en: The first value to perform the logical XOR on.
local: 对其执行逻辑异或的第一个值。

en: The first value to perform the logical XOR on.
local: 对其执行逻辑异或的第一个值。

en: Outputs an on signal if only A is on, or only B is on. The output is off if A and B are both on or off.
local: 如果只有A接通或只有B接通，则输出接通信号。如果A和B都打开或关闭，则输出关闭。

en: Negative numbers are converted to positive numbers, whilst positive numbers are unchanged.
local: 负数转换为正数，而正数不变。

en: Outputs the absolute value of a number input.
local: 输出数字输入的绝对值。

en: The absolute value of the input.
The number to get the absolute value of.
local: 要获取的绝对值的数字。

en: Takes two number inputs, adds them together, and outputs the result.
local: 接受两个数字输入，将它们相加，然后输出结果。

en: The first value to be added.
Outputs the result of A + B.
The second value to be added.
The upper and lower values to clamp to can be configured by selecting this component with the select tool.
local: 通过使用选择工具选择此组件，可以配置限制区间的端点值。

en: The clamp takes a number input and clamps it to a set range.
local: Clamp函数接受一个数字输入并将其限制到一个设定的范围。\n（译者注：假定输入值为x，限定区间为[a,b]。当x<=a时，输出值为a；当x>=b时，输出值为b；当a<=x<=b时，输出值为x。）

en: The input after being clamped within the upper and lower bounds.
The value to clamp within the upper and lower bounds.
The number that is being outputted can be configured by selecting this component with the select tool.
local: 可以通过使用选择工具选择此组件来配置常数数值。

en: Stores and constantly outputs a value which increases by an input amount.
local: 存储并持续输出一个增加输入量的值。

en: A counter which increases with a set speed.
local: 以一定速度增加的计数器。

en: The speed the count rises by.
A counter which oscillates between -1 and +1 with a set speed.
local: 以设定速度在-1和+1之间振荡的计数器。

en: The speed the count changes by.
If a division by 0 occurs, an on signal will be produced and the output number value will be set to 0.
local: 如果出现除以0的情况，将产生一个on信号，并将输出数值设置为0.

en: Takes two number inputs, divides one by the other, and outputs the result.
local: 接受两个数字输入，一个除以另一个，然后输出结果。

en: Outputs true when a division by 0 occurs.
The result of A divided by B, or 0 attempting to divide by 0.
local: A除以B的结果，或0（当B=0时的返回值）。

en: The exponent can be changed by selecting this component with the select tool.
local: 通过使用选择工具选择此组件，可以更改指数。

en: Outputs its input raised to the power of a selected exponent.
local: 将其输入提升为所选指数的幂。

en: The input raised to the power of the selected exponent.
local: 提高到所选指数的幂的输入。

en: Outputs an on signal if the first input is greater than the second, and outputs an off signal if the first input is less than or equal to the second.
local: 如果第一个输入大于第二个输入，则输出打开信号；如果第一个输入小于或等于第二个输入，则输出关闭信号。

en: The value to be compared to.
Outputs an on signal if A is greater than B. Outputs an off signal if A is less than or equal to B.
local: 如果A大于B，则输出on信号；如果A小于或等于B，则输出off信号。

en: The inverter takes a number as input, multiplies it by -1, and outputs the result.
local: 逆变器将一个数字作为输入，乘以-1，然后输出结果。

en: The number that will be inverted.
The inverse of the input. This is equivalent to multiplying the input by -1.
local: 输入的倒数。这相当于将输入乘以-1。

en: Outputs an on signal if the first input is less than the second, and outputs an off signal if the first input is greater than or equal to the second.
local: 如果第一个输入小于第二个输入，则输出打开信号；如果第一个输入大于或等于第二个输入，则输出关闭信号。

en: The value to be compared to.
Outputs an on signal if A is less than B. Outputs an off signal if A is greater than or equal to B.
local: 如果A小于B，则输出打开信号。如果A大于或等于B，则输出关闭信号。

en: Takes two number inputs, outputs the remainder after dividing the first by the second.
local: 接受两个数字输入，输出第一个除以第二个后的余数。

en: Outputs the remainder when A is divided by B.
The value to modulo A by.
Takes two number inputs, multiplies them together, and outputs the result.
local: 接受两个数字输入，将它们相乘，然后输出结果。

en: Outputs the result of multiplying A by B.
The number input will be stored when an on signal is received. A secondary on/off signal can be used to clear the stored value, resetting it to the configured value set using the select tool.
local: 当接收到接通信号时，数字输入将被存储。辅助开/关信号可用于清除存储值，使用选择工具将其重置为配置值集。

en: A memory register that can store a number value.
local: 一种能存储数值的存储寄存器。

en: The value that is stored in the memory.
The value that will be stored when receiving an on signal.
local: 接收到接通信号时存储的值。

en: Stores the input value when receiving an on signal.
local: 存储接收到打开信号时的输入值。

en: The available functions are sin, cos, tan, asin, acos and atan. If an invalid number is input, the output will be 0. Sin, cos and tan accept inputs measured in turns. Asin, acos and atan output values measured in turns. The function can be set by selecting this component with the select tool.
local: 可用的功能有sin、cos、tan、asin、acos和atan。如果输入的数字无效，则输出为0.Sin、cos和tan接受轮流测量的输入。Asin、acos和atan输出值依次测量。使用选择工具选择此组件可以设置此功能。

en: Provides a set of basic trigonometry functions.
local: 提供一组基本三角函数。

en: f(x), where f is the selected function and x is the input.
local: f(x)，其中f是所选函数，x是输入。

en: Takes two number inputs, subtracts the second from first, and outputs the result.
local: 接受两个数字输入，从第一个数字中减去第二个数字，然后输出结果。

en: Outputs the result of subtracting B from A.

The junction can be switched using an on/off signal. When the signal is on, the number is passed through to the first output and a value of 0 is passed to the second. When the signal is off, the number is passed through to the second output with the first being set to 0.
local: 节点可以通过一个开/关信号来进行切换。当信号为开时，数字将被输出到第一个输出，而第二个输出端输出0。若信号为关则相反。

en: Acts as a junction for two number signals.
local: 充当两个数字信号的连接。

en: Controls which of the two output paths the input value will be sent to.
local: 控制输入值将发送到两个输出路径中的哪一个。

en: The value to pass through the junction.
Receives the input value when the switch signal is set to on.
local: 当开关信号设置为on时接收输入值。

en: Receives the input value when the switch signal is set to off.
local: 当开关信号设置为off时接收输入值。

en: Which of the two inputs is sent to the output is determined by the on/off switch signal. When the signal is on, the first value is sent to the output. When it is off, the second output is sent.
local: 两个输入中的哪一个被发送到输出由开/关开关信号决定。当信号打开时，第一个值被发送到输出端。当它关闭时，发送第二个输出。

en: Acts as a switchbox for two number signals.
local: 用作两个数字信号的开关箱。

en: Controls which of the two input values will be sent to the output.
local: 控制将两个输入值中的哪一个发送到输出。

en: The value to output when the switch signal is on.
local: 开关信号打开时要输出的值。

en: Outputs the first value when the switch signal is on, and the second value when it is off.
local: 当开关信号打开时输出第一个值，当开关信号关闭时输出第二个值。

en: The value to output when the switch signal is off.
local: 开关信号关闭时要输出的值。

en: A lower and upper bound to the threshold must be set. The output is set to on if the input value is less than or equal to the upper bound, and greater than or equal to the lower bound. If it is outside this range, the output is set to off. The threshold bounds can be configured by selecting this component with the select tool.
local: 必须设置阈值的下限和上限。如果输入值小于或等于上限，并且大于或等于下限，则输出设置为“开”。如果超出此范围，则将输出设置为“关”。使用选择工具选择此组件可以配置阈值边界。

en: Takes a value and compares it to a set threshold.
local: 获取一个值并将其与设置的阈值进行比较。

en: The value to test within the threshold.
Outputs an on signal when the input value is within the set threshold.
local: 当输入值在设定的阈值范围内时，输出接通信号。

en: The function can be entered by selecting this component with the select tool. A full list of valid operations are also visible in the component's selection menu.
local: 通过使用选择工具选择该组件可以进入该函数。在组件的选择菜单中也可以看到有效操作的完整列表。

en: Evaluates a mathematical function with up to 3 variable inputs.
local: 使用最多3个变量输入计算数学函数。

en: Outputs the evaluation of the entered function.
local: 输出对输入函数的求值。

en: The function can be entered by selecting this component with the select tool. A full list of valid operations are also visible in the component's selection menu.
local: 通过使用选择工具选择该组件可以进入该函数。在组件的选择菜单中也可以看到有效操作的完整列表。

en: Evaluates a mathematical function with 1 variable inputs
local: 用1个变量输入计算数学函数

en: Outputs the evaluation of the entered function.
local: 输出对输入函数的求值。

en: When both inputs are off, there is no change in state. If both Set and Reset are set to on, the state will be toggled.
local: 当两个输入都关闭时，状态没有变化。如果Set和Reset都设置为on，则状态将被切换（反转）。

en: A JK flip-flop that can be set and reset using two on/off inputs.
local: 一种JK触发器，可以用两个开/关输入进行设置和复位。

en: The internal state of the flip-flop.
The inverse of the internal state of the flip-flop.
local: 触发器内部状态的取非。

en: It takes the current measured output of a system or sensor, and a desired target measurement. It outputs a value that can be used as an input to the system to gradually correct its error. For example, the controller could input to an engine's throttle to maintain a desired speed or altitude. The control terms (proportional, integral and derivative) can be set by selecting the component with the select tool. The control terms must be carefully tuned for optimal output.
local: 它获取系统或传感器的电流测量输出，以及所需的目标测量。它输出一个值，可以用作系统的输入，以逐步纠正其错误。例如，控制器可以输入发动机的油门以保持所需的速度或高度。控制项(比例、积分和导数)可以通过使用选择工具选择组件来设置。必须仔细调整控制项以获得最佳输出。

en: A control loop feedback mechanism that measures and corrects the error in a system over time.
local: 一种控制回路反馈机制，随着时间的推移测量并校正系统中的错误。

en: Sets whether or not the controller is active. When inactive, stored values are reset.
local: 设置控制器是否处于活动状态。不活动时，存储的值将重置。

en: The output computed by the controller.
The current measured value of the system.
The desired value to correct the process variable to.
This can allow regular push buttons to act as toggle buttons.
local: 这可以让常规的按压按钮充当切换按钮。

en: This component has an internal on/off switch that is toggled every time a new on signal is sent to its input.
local: 此组件有一个内部开/关开关，每次向其输入端发送新的开信号时都会切换该开关。

en: An on signal toggles the internal on/off switch.
local: 打开信号切换内部开/关开关。

en: The output of the internal on/off switch.
When both inputs are off, there is no change in state. If both Set and Reset are set to on, Reset will take precedence.
local: 当两个输入都设置为off时，状态没有变化。如果Set和Reset都设置为on，将创建一个无效状态，并且两个输出都设置为off。

en: An SR latch that can be set and reset using two on/off inputs.
local: 一种SR锁存器，可使用两个开/关输入进行设置和复位。

en: The internal state of the latch.
The inverse of the internal state of the latch.
local: 锁存器内部状态的取非。

en: Combines the outputs of two engines, allowing you to connect multiple engines to the same input.
local: 合并两个引擎的输出，允许您将多个引擎连接收到同一个输入。

en: Outputs the combined power of engine 1 and 2.
local: 输出发动机1和2的综合功率。

en: To prevent a loss of power, it should be connected in series between the engine and its receiving component.
local: 为防止功率损失，应在发动机与其接收部件之间串联。

en: The power meter allows you to take a measurement of how much power is being output from an engine to a specific component.
local: 功率计允许您测量从发动机输出到特定部件的功率。

en: Relays the power received from an engine.
local: 中继从发动机接收的功率。

en: This can allow regular push buttons to act as toggle buttons.
local: 这可以让常规按钮充当切换按钮。

en: This component has an internal on/off switch that is toggled every time a new on signal is sent to its input.
local: 此组件有一个内部开/关开关，每次向其输入端发送新的开信号时都会切换该开关。

en: An on signal toggles the internal on/off switch.
local: 打开信号切换内部开/关开关。

en: The output of the internal on/off switch.

The up input moves the value towards 1, and the down input moves it towards -1. This component can be used for converting on/off button presses into a standard number value that can be used to control any mechanical components that accept a standard number input.
local: 向上输入将值移向1，向下输入将值移向-1。此组件可用于将“开/关”按钮压入转换为标准数值，该数值可用于控制接受标准数值输入的任何机械组件。

en: This component uses two on/off signals to move an internal value between -1 and 1.
local: 此组件使用两个开/关信号在-1和1之间移动一个内部值。

en: The internally stored value between -1 an 1.
local: 内部存储的值介于-1和1之间。

en: The primary needle is white and the secondary needle is red. The positions of the needles represent values ranging from -1 to 1 by default. This range can be configured by selecting the display with the select tool.
local: 主针为白色，次针为红色。默认情况下，针的位置表示从-1到1的值。可以通过使用选择工具选择显示器来配置此范围。

en: A display with two needles that can be positioned independently.
local: 有两个可以独立定位的针的显示器。

en: The numerical value that sets the position of the white needle.
The numerical value that sets the position of the red needle.
local: 设置红色指针位置的数值。

en: Enables the backlight when receiving an on signal.
local: 接收到打开信号时启用背光。

en: A large generator unit for converting mechanical power to electricity.
local: 把机械能转换成电能的大型发电机组。

en: The torque power input to convert to electric energy.
local: 将转矩功率输入转换为电能。

en: The electric connection to output electric energy.
Data output giving the electrical generation of the generator.
local: 提供发电机发电的数据输出。

en: A medium generator unit for converting mechanical power to electricity.
local: 把机械能转换成电能的中型发电机组。

en: The torque power input to convert to electric energy.
local: 将转矩功率输入转换为电能。

en: The electric connection to output electric energy.
Data output giving the electrical generation of the generator.
local: 提供发电机发电的数据输出。

en: A small generator unit for converting mechanical power to electricity.
local: 把机械能转换成电能的小型发电机组。

en: The torque power input to convert to electric energy.
local: 将转矩功率输入转换为电能。

en: The electric connection to output electric energy.
Data output giving the electrical generation of the generator.
local: 提供发电机发电的数据输出。

en: Power received from an engine affects the forward and backward force generated. This propeller will only operate underwater.
local: 从发动机接收到的功率影响所产生的前进和后退力。这个螺旋桨只能在水下工作。

en: Receives power generated by an engine.
local: 接收发动机产生的能量。

en: The coordinates represent an offset from the centre of the world, measured in metres. You can check the world coordinates of any location by looking at your map.
local: 坐标表示距世界中心的偏移量，单位为米。你可以通过查看地图来查看任何地点的世界坐标。

en: Outputs its x and y world coordinates according to its location on the map.
local: 根据其在地图上的位置输出其x和y世界坐标。

en: The x coordinate of this component on the world map.
local: 世界地图上此组件的x坐标。

en: The y coordinate of this component on the world map.
local: 世界地图上此组件的y坐标。

en: It outputs stabilised values that can be sent to rotors and engines to make them much easier to control. An on/off input allows you to activate and deactivate the internal auto-hover circuit. When auto-hover is enabled, the gyroscope will attempt to keep your helicopter steady.
local: 它输出稳定值，可以发送到螺旋桨和发动机，使它们更容易控制。开/关输入允许您激活和停用内部自动悬停电路。启用自动悬停后，陀螺仪将尝试保持直升机稳定。

en: The gyroscope takes 4 standard value signals representing the desired yaw, pitch, roll and vertical motion of a helicopter.
local: 陀螺仪接收4个标准值信号，表示直升机所需的偏航(Yaw)、俯仰(Pitch)、偏转(Roll)和垂直运动。

en: Accepts a standard value between -1 and 1 representing the desired roll speed.
local: 接受一个介于-1和1之间的标准值，表示所需的偏转(Roll)速度。

en: Outputs a standard value between -1 and 1 representing a stabilised roll speed.
local: 输出一个介于-1和1之间的标准值，表示稳定的偏转(Roll)速度。

en: Accepts a standard value between -1 and 1 representing the desired pitch speed.
local: 接受一个介于-1和1之间的标准值，表示所需的俯仰(Pitch)速度。

en: Outputs a standard value between -1 and 1 representing a stabilised pitch speed.
local: 输出一个介于-1和1之间的标准值，表示稳定的俯仰(Pitch)速度。

en: Accepts a standard value between -1 and 1 representing the desired yaw speed.
local: 接受一个介于-1和1之间的标准值，表示所需的偏航(Yaw)速度。

en: Outputs a standard value between -1 and 1 representing a stabilised yaw speed.
local: 输出一个介于-1和1之间的标准值，表示稳定的偏航(Yaw)速度。

en: Accepts a standard value between -1 and 1 representing the desired vertical speed.
local: 接受一个介于-1和1之间的标准值，表示所需的垂直速度。

en: Outputs a standard value between 0 and 1 representing a stabilised upward thrust.
local: 输出0到1之间的标准值，表示稳定的向上推力。

en: Enables the gyroscope's auto-hover circuit when receiving an on signal.
local: 当接收到接通信号时，启用陀螺仪的自动悬停电路。

en: Pressing [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] while attached will detach you depending on which you pressed to attach. The handle can be used to drag vehicles around. If a vehicle is too heavy to move, you will be detached automatically when you move outside the handle's interaction range.
local: 在连接上时按[$[action_interact_left]/[$[action_interact_right]]将分离您，具体取决于您开始按了哪个键。把手可以用来拖动载具。如果载具太重而无法移动，则当您在把手的交互作用范围之外移动时，将自动分离。

en: A handle that you can attach to by pressing [$[action_interact_left]] or [$[action_interact_right]].
Sliding hatch that can be opened and closed using an on/off signal.
local: 滑动舱口，可使用开/关信号打开和关闭。

en: Opens the hatch when receiving an on signal, and closes it when receiving an off signal.
local: 接收到打开信号时打开舱口，接收到关闭信号时关闭舱口。

en: When enabled, the heater will warm any players within a 10m radius, allowing them to survive cold Arctic weather conditions.
local: 启用后，加热器将加热半径10米范围内的任何玩家，使他们能够在寒冷的北极气候条件下生存。

en: A small heater that will provide warmth to nearby players.
local: 一个小加热器，可以为附近的玩家提供温暖。

en: Enables the heating element when receiving an on signal.
local: 在接收到接通信号时启用加热元件。

en: A heat exchanger that averages heat between two air systems at a rate proportional to the component's size.
local: 冷却器以与组件尺寸成比例的速率平衡两边气体的热量。

en: A heat exchanger that averages heat between two air systems.
local: 平衡两边气体的热量的热交换器。

en: A heat exchanger that averages heat between two air systems at a rate proportional to the component's size.
local: 冷却器以与组件尺寸成比例的速率平衡两边气体的热量。

en: A heat exchanger that averages heat between two air systems.
local: 平衡两边气体的热量的热交换器。

en: A heat exchanger that averages heat between two air systems at a rate proportional to the component's size.
local: 冷却器以与组件尺寸成比例的速率平衡两边气体的热量。

en: A heat exchanger that averages heat between two air systems.
local: 平衡两边气体的热量的热交换器。

en: Three standard number inputs control the rotor's swashplate, allowing you to affect the pitch, roll, and collective rotor angle. Power received from an engine affects the amount of up and down force that the rotor will generate.
local: 三个标准数字输入控制螺旋桨的旋转斜盘，允许您影响俯仰(Pitch)、侧倾和总螺旋桨角度。从发动机接收到的功率影响螺旋桨将产生的上下力的大小。

en: A heavy duty rotor with thrust vectoring.
local: 带有推力矢量的重型螺旋桨。

en: Standard value between -1 and 1 representing the desired roll amount.
local: 介于-1和1之间的标准值，表示想要偏转(Roll)的量。

en: Standard value between -1 and 1 representing the desired pitch amount.
local: 介于-1和1之间的标准值，表示想要俯仰(Pitch)的量。

en: Receives power generated by an engine.
local: 接收发动机产生的能量。

en: Standard value between -1 and 1 representing the desired pitch amount.
local: 介于-1和1之间的标准值，表示总距。

en: Three standard number inputs control the rotor's swashplate, allowing you to affect the pitch, roll, and collective rotor angle. Power received from an engine affects the amount of up and down force that the rotor will generate.
local: 三个标准数字输入控制螺旋桨的旋转斜盘，允许您影响俯仰(Pitch)、侧倾和总螺旋桨角度。从发动机接收到的功率影响螺旋桨将产生的上下力的大小。

en: A large heavy duty rotor with thrust vectoring.
local: 带有推力矢量的大型重型螺旋桨。

en: Standard value between -1 and 1 representing the desired roll amount.
local: 介于-1和1之间的标准值，表示想要偏转(Roll)的量。

en: Standard value between -1 and 1 representing the desired pitch amount.
local: 介于-1和1之间的标准值，表示想要俯仰(Pitch)的量。

en: Receives power generated by an engine.
local: 接收发动机产生的能量。

en: Standard value between -1 and 1 representing the desired pitch amount.
local: 介于-1和1之间的标准值，表示总距。

en: Two standard number inputs control the rotor's swashplate, allowing you to affect the its pitch and roll. Power received from an engine affects the amount of up and down force that the rotor will generate. The output force of this rotor is decreased when underwater.
local: 两个标准数字输入控制螺旋桨的旋转斜盘，允许您影响其俯仰(Pitch)和侧倾。从发动机接收到的功率影响螺旋桨将产生的上下力的大小。在水下时，该螺旋桨的输出力减小。

en: A large helicopter rotor with controllable pitch and roll.
local: 具有可控制的俯仰(Pitch)和偏转(Roll)的大型直升机旋翼。

en: Standard value between -1 and 1 representing the desired roll amount.
local: 介于-1和1之间的标准值，表示想要偏转(Roll)的量。

en: Standard value between -1 and 1 representing the desired pitch amount.
local: 介于-1和1之间的标准值，表示想要俯仰(Pitch)的量。

en: Receives power generated by an engine.
local: 接收发动机产生的能量。

en: Standard value between -1 and 1 representing the desired pitch amount.
local: 介于-1和1之间的标准值，表示总距。

en: The reading can be read from the sensor's number output and is measured from 0 (no fog) to 1 (max fog).
local: 读数可以从传感器的数字输出中读取，测量范围为0(无雾)到1(最大雾)。

en: A humidity sensor for measuring the current fog and visibility meteorological conditions.
local: 用于测量当前雾和能见度气象条件的湿度传感器。

en: The level of humidity in the air, relating to the fog visibility.
local: 气体中的湿度水平，与雾的可见度有关。

en: Setting the impact threshold property will tune the sensitivity for impacts. When the instant change in velocity from an impact exceeds the threshold, and on signal is produced.
local: 设置冲击阈值能够调整敏感度。 当来自撞击的瞬时速度变化超过阈值时，将产生一个信号。

en: A sensor activated by a sudden change in velocity.
local: 传感器能够检测瞬间的速度变化

en: Outputs an on signal when instant change in velocity exceeds the impact threshold.
local: 当瞬间速度变化超过阈值时，输出一个on信号。

en: A simple light that can be used as an indicator in logic systems.
local: 一种简单的灯，可在逻辑系统中用作指示器。

en: Switches the light on when receiving an on signal.
local: 接收到接通信号时，打开灯。

en: Three channels of the composite input can be used to set the red, green and blue components of the indicator's color using numbers between 0 and 1. The light can also operate in HSV mode, where the 3 inputs correspond to the hue, saturation and value (brightness) of the color between 0 and 1. The color mode and input channels can be customised by selecting this component with the select tool.
local: 组合输入的三个通道可用于使用0到1之间的数字设置指示器颜色的红色、绿色和蓝色分量。灯光也可以在HSV模式下工作，其中3个输入对应于0到1之间颜色的色调、饱和度和值(亮度)。颜色模式和输入通道可以通过使用选择工具选择此组件进行自定义。

en: An advanced indicator that can be controlled using a microcontroller.
local: 一种可以用微控制器控制的高级指示器。

en: Composite link containing the indicator's color data.
local: 包含指示器颜色数据的复合链接。

en: The 4 instruments can be selected in the properties window. Each type of instrument has options for choosing the composite channels that they read from or write to. Composite signals are bridged from the input node to the output node to enable displays to be chained together. Instruments marked as '(On/Off)' require multiple on/off signals to control each of their segments individually.
local: 可以在“属性”窗口中选择这4种仪器。每种类型的仪器都有选择读写复合通道的选项。复合信号从输入节点桥接收到输出节点，以使显示链接在一起。标记为“(开/关)”的仪表需要多个开/关信号来单独控制其每个段。

en: A customisable panel that can have up to 4 different instruments, controlled by a composite signal from a microcontroller.
local: 一种可定制的面板，可以有多达4种不同的仪器，由微控制器的复合信号控制。

en: Output signal containing data set by buttons on the display.
local: 包含由显示器上的按钮设置的数据的输出信号。

en: Input signal containing data to be displayed.
local: 包含要显示的数据的输入信号。

en: Enables the backlight when receiving an on signal.
local: 接收到打开信号时启用背光。

en: A heat exchanger that averages heat between two liquid systems at a rate proportional to the component's size.
local: 冷却器以与组件尺寸成比例的速率平衡两边液体的热量。

en: A heat exchanger that averages heat between two liquid systems.
local: 平衡两边液体的热量的热交换器。

en: A heat exchanger that averages heat between two liquid systems at a rate proportional to the component's size.
local: 冷却器以与组件尺寸成比例的速率平衡两边液体的热量。

en: A heat exchanger that averages heat between two liquid systems.
local: 平衡两边液体的热量的热交换器。

en: Pressing [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] will equip/store the selected item. Hold [$[action_equipment_use]] to zoom in on faraway objects. This equipment can be stored on the belt when not in use.
local: 按下 [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] 能装备/收起选中物品。 按住 [$[action_equipment_use]] 来放大观看远处目标。 不使用时，这个装备能挂腰带上。

en: A small equipment storage unit containing a pair of binoculars.
local: 小型装备架，存储一个望远镜

en: Pressing [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] will equip/store the selected item. Press [$[action_equipment_use]] to attach the cable to an unoccupied electrical cable anchor. Pressing [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] on an occupied electical cable anchor will retrieve the cable if the player has inventory space to hold it. This equipment can be stored on the back when not in use.
local: 按下 [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] 能装备/收起选中物品。 按下 [$[action_equipment_use]] 来将电缆连接到未占用的电缆锚点。 如果有剩余空间，在已经占用的电缆锚点按下 [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] 将会把电缆收回到玩家库存。 不使用时，这个装备能够收到背后。

en: A large equipment storage unit containing 20m of electrical cable.
local: 大型装备架，存储共计20m长的电缆

en: Pressing [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] will equip/store the selected item. When held, the red needle of the compass will point northwards. This equipment can be stored on the belt when not in use.
local: 按下 [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] 能装备/收起选中物品。拿在手上时，红色指针会指向北方。不使用时，这个装备能挂腰带上。

en: A small equipment storage unit containing a compass.
local: 小型装备架，存储一个指南针

en: Pressing [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] will equip/store the selected item. Press [$[action_equipment_use]] on an incapacitated survivor to revive them. Survivors who have been left incapacitated for too long will expire and not be revivable. This equipment requires electric charge to function, and will recharge when placed into a powered large equipment storage unit. This equipment can be stored on the back when not in use.
local: 按下 [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] 能装备/收起选中物品。对着丧失行动能力的角色按下 [$[action_equipment_use]] 可以使其复苏。丧失行动能力过长时间的幸存者会无法被救活，该设备需要充电才能发挥作用，放入已供电的大型装备架时充电。不使用时可以放在背后。

en: A large equipment storage unit containing a defibrillator.
local: 大型装备架，存储一个除颤器

en: Pressing [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] will equip/store the selected item. Hold [$[action_equipment_use]] to spray a stream of water capable of extinguishing fires. This equipment has a limited water capacity and cannot be refilled. This equipment can be stored on the back when not in use.
local: 按下 [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] 能装备/收起选中物品。对准火焰按住 [$[action_equipment_use]] 喷出一柱水来灭火。这个装备有着有限的水容量而且不能装填。不使用时可以放在背后。

en: A large equipment storage unit containing a fire extinguisher.
local: 大型装备架，存储一个灭火器

en: Pressing [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] will equip/store the selected item. Press [$[action_equipment_use]] to heal yourself, or heal a survivor highlighted by your crosshair. This equipment has limited uses, picking up additional first aid kits will replenish these uses. This equipment can be stored on the belt when not in use.
local: 按下 [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] 能装备/收起选中物品。按下 [$[action_equipment_use]] 来治疗你自己, 或者准星指向的高亮幸存者。这个装备有使用次数限制，拿起其他急救包能够补充使用次数。不使用时可以挂在腰带上。

en: A small equipment storage unit containing a first aid kit.
local: 小型装备架，存储一个急救包

en: Pressing [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] will equip/store the selected item. Press [$[action_equipment_use]] to throw a red smoke flare which burns for a long time. This equipment has a limited uses, picking up additional flares will replenish these uses. This equipment can be stored on the belt when not in use.
local: 按下 [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] 能装备/收起选中物品。按下 [$[action_equipment_use]] 来扔出一个持续时间内释放红烟并发光的信号弹。这个装备有使用次数限制，拿起其他投掷信号弹能够补充使用次数。不使用时可以挂在腰带上。

en: A small equipment storage unit containing flares.
local: 小型装备架，存储投掷信号弹

en: Pressing [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] will equip/store the selected item. Press [$[action_equipment_use]] to fire a red illumination flare that burns for a short time. Press [$[action_equipment_secondary]] to unload any flaregun round in the gun. Using a box of flaregun ammo will allow the gun to be reloaded with additional flaregun rounds. This equipment can be stored on the belt when not in use.
local: 按下 [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] 能装备/收起选中物品。按下 [$[action_equipment_use]] 来发射一个持续较短时间的发光信号弹，按下 [$[action_equipment_secondary]] 来卸载枪中弹药，使用一盒信号枪弹药后可以让枪重新装填。不使用时可以挂在腰上。

en: A small equipment storage unit containing a flaregun preloaded with 1 flaregun round.
local: 小型装备架，存储一个带一发弹药的信号弹枪

en: Pressing [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] will equip/store the selected item. Press [$[action_equipment_use]] to reload any unloaded flaregun in the players inventory. This equipment has a limited uses, picking up additional boxes of flaregun ammo will replenish these uses. This equipment can be stored on the belt when not in use.
local: 按下 [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] 能装备/收起选中物品。按下 [$[action_equipment_use]] 来给在库存中没有装弹的任何信号枪装上信号弹。有着有限使用次数，拿起其他信号枪弹药能够补充使用次数。不使用时可以挂在腰上。

en: A small equipment storage unit containing a box flaregun ammo.
local: 小装备架，存储一盒信号枪弹药

en: Pressing [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] will equip/store the selected item. Press [$[action_equipment_use]] to toggle the flashlight on or off. This equipment requires electric charge to function, and will recharge when placed into a powered small equipment storage unit. This equipment can be stored on the belt when not in use.
local: 按下 [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] 能装备/收起选中物品。按下 [$[action_equipment_use]] 来开关手电筒。该设备需要充电才能发挥作用，放入已供电的小型装备架时充电。不使用时可以挂在腰上。

en: A small equipment storage unit containing a flashlight.
local: 小型装备架，存储一个手电筒

en: Pressing [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] will equip/store the selected item. Press [$[action_equipment_use]] to attach the hose to an unoccupied fluid hose anchor. Pressing [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] on an occupied fluid hose anchor will retrieve the hose if the player has inventory space to hold it. If the hose contains water, press [$[action_equipment_secondary]] to toggle open the hose valve and allow the water to flow freely. This equipment can be stored on the back when not in use.
local: 按下 [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] 能装备/收起选中物品。 按下 [$[action_equipment_use]] 来将电缆连接到未占用的软管锚点。 如果有剩余空间，在已经占用的软管锚点按下 [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] 将会把软管收回到玩家库存。如果软管中有流体，按下 [$[action_equipment_secondary]] 可以开关阀门允许流体自由流动。不使用时，这个装备能够收到背后。

en: A large equipment storage unit containing 20m of fluid hosing.
local: 大型装备架，存储20m长流体软管

en: Pressing [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] will equip/store the selected item. Hold [$[action_equipment_use]] to zoom in on faraway objects. The night vision effect provides improved visibility in low light conditions, but greatly hinders visibility in daylight. This equipment requires electric charge to function, and will recharge when placed into a powered small equipment storage unit. This equipment can be stored on the belt when not in use.
local: 按下 [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] 能装备/收起选中物品。按住 [$[action_equipment_use]] 来放大远处目标。夜视效果提供了在微光环境下更好的能见度，但在白天会受到极大影响。该设备需要充电才能发挥作用，放入已供电的小型装备架时充电。不使用时可以挂在腰上。

en: A small equipment storage unit containing a pair of night vision binoculars.
local: 小型装备架，存储一个夜视望远镜

en: Pressing [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] will equip/store the selected item. Press [$[action_equipment_use]] to recover your breath while underwater. This equipment has a limited air capacity, and will refill when placed into a powered small equipment storage unit. This equipment can be stored on the belt when not in use.
local: 按下 [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] 能装备/收起选中物品。按下[$[action_equipment_use]]来在水底恢复呼吸，这个装备有有限的气体容量，只有放在已供电的小型装备架时才会回复。不使用时可以挂在腰上。

en: A small equipment storage unit containing an oxygen mask.
local: 小型装备架，存储一个氧气面罩

en: Pressing [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] will equip/store the selected item. Hold [$[action_equipment_use]] transmit voice audio. Press [$[action_equipment_secondary]] to cycle between frequencies 0~8, or turn the radio off. When a frequncy is selected, the radio will transmit and receive voice audio on that frequency only. This equipment requires electric charge to function, and will recharge when placed into a powered small equipment storage unit. This equipment can be stored on the belt when not in use.
local: 按下 [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] 能装备/收起选中物品。按住 [$[action_equipment_use]] 来发送语音，按下 [$[action_equipment_secondary]] 来在频道0~8之间切换或关掉无线电。当选中一个特定频率后，无线电只会在该频率上收发音频信号。该设备需要充电才能发挥作用，放入已供电的小型装备架时充电。不使用时可以挂在腰上。

en: A small equipment storage unit containing a handheld radio.
local: 小型装备架，存储一个手持无线电
装备架(无线电信号定位器)

en: Pressing [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] will equip/store the selected item. Press [$[action_equipment_use]] to toggle the locator on or off. When active, the locator produces audible beeps that increase in frequency as the player nears an active transponder. The handheld locator has a shorter detection range than the vehicle mounted locator, but can narrow down the target location to a smaller area. This equipment requires electric charge to function, and will recharge when placed into a powered large equipment storage unit. This equipment can be stored on the back when not in use.
local: 按下 [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] 能装备/收起选中物品。按下[$[action_equipment_use]]来开关定位器。当打开时，定位器会持续发出滴滴声，并且越接近信号源滴滴声频率越高。手持无线电定位器的有效范围比载具定位器小，但能够在小范围内更加精确定位。该设备需要充电才能发挥作用，放入已供电的大型装备架时充电。不使用时可以放在背后。

en: A large equipment storage unit containing a handheld transponder locator.
local: 小型装备架，存储一个手持无线电信号定位器

en: Pressing [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] will equip/store the selected item. Press [$[action_equipment_use]] to toggle the remote control on or off. Press [$[action_equipment_secondary]] to cycle between frequencies 0~8. When active, the remote control uses the basic vehicle pilot seat input bindings and transmits them as composite radio data on the selected frequency. This equipment requires electric charge to function, and will recharge when placed into a powered small equipment storage unit. This equipment can be stored on the belt when not in use.
local: 按下 [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] 能装备/收起选中物品。按下 [$[action_equipment_use]] 来切换远程控制开关，按下 [$[action_equipment_secondary]] 来循环0~8的频率。当开启时，远程控制将玩家操作输出为混合信号(参照基础载具控制)发送到指定频率。该设备需要充电才能发挥作用，放入已供电的小型装备架时充电。不使用时可以挂在腰上。

en: A small equipment storage unit containing a remote control unit.
local: 小型装备架，存储一个远程控制单元

en: Pressing [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] will equip/store the selected item. Press [$[action_equipment_use]] to attach the rope to any rope anchor. Pressing [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] on an occupied rope anchor will retrieve the rope if the player has inventory space to hold it. This equipment can be stored on the back when not in use.
local: 按下 [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] 能装备/收起选中物品。 按下 [$[action_equipment_use]] 来将绳索连接到未占用的绳索锚点。 如果有剩余空间，在已经占用的绳索锚点按下 [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] 将会把绳索收回到玩家库存。 不使用时，这个装备能够收到背后。

en: A large equipment storage unit containing 20m of rope.
local: 大型装备架，存储20m长绳索

en: Pressing [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] will equip/store the selected item. Press [$[action_equipment_use]] to toggle the strobe light on or off. Press [$[action_equipment_secondary]] to toggle MOB (man overboard) mode, which will automatically turn the strobe light on if the player is submerged in water. The strobe light will continue to function when unequipped or discarded. This equipment requires electric charge to function, and will recharge when placed into a powered small equipment storage unit. This equipment can be stored on the belt.
local: 按下 [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] 能装备/收起选中物品。按下 [$[action_equipment_use]] 来开关频闪灯。按下 [$[action_equipment_secondary]] 开关MOB(落水)模式，MOB模式下会在玩家落入水中时自动打开频闪。频闪灯在不被装备时依然会继续作用。该设备需要充电才能发挥作用，放入已供电的小型装备架时充电。不使用时可以挂在腰上。

en: A small equipment storage unit containing a strobe light.
local: 小型装备架，存储一个频闪灯

en: Pressing [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] will equip/store the selected item. Press [$[action_equipment_use]] to toggle the strobe light on or off. Press [$[action_equipment_secondary]] to toggle MOB (man overboard) mode, which will automatically turn the strobe light on if the player is submerged in water. The strobe light will continue to function when unequipped or discarded. The infrared strobe light flashes are only visible to infrared cameras. This equipment requires electric charge to function, and will recharge when placed into a powered small equipment storage unit. This equipment can be stored on the belt.
local: 按下 [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] 能装备/收起选中物品。按下 [$[action_equipment_use]] 来开关频闪灯。按下 [$[action_equipment_secondary]] 开关MOB(落水)模式，MOB模式下会在玩家落入水中时自动打开频闪。频闪灯在不被装备时依然会继续作用。红外频闪灯只能被红外模式下的摄像头观察到。该设备需要充电才能发挥作用，放入已供电的小型装备架时充电。不使用时可以挂在腰上。

en: A small equipment storage unit containing an infrared strobe light.
local: 小型装备架，存储一个红外频闪灯

en: Pressing [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] will equip/store the selected item. Press [$[action_equipment_use]] to toggle the transponder on or off. Press [$[action_equipment_secondary]] to toggle MOB (man overboard) mode, which will automatically turn the transponder on if the player is submerged in water. The transponder will continue to function when unequipped or discarded. This equipment requires electric charge to function, and will recharge when placed into a powered small equipment storage unit. This equipment can be stored on the belt.
local: 按下 [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] 能装备/收起选中物品。按下 [$[action_equipment_use]] 来开关应答器。按下 [$[action_equipment_secondary]] 开关MOB(落水)模式，MOB模式下会在玩家落入水中时自动打开应答器。应答器在不被装备时依然会继续作用。该设备需要充电才能发挥作用，放入已供电的小型装备架时充电。不使用时可以挂在腰上。

en: A small equipment storage unit containing a handheld transponder.
local: 小型装备架，存储一个手持应答器

en: Pressing [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] will equip/store the selected item. Hold [$[action_equipment_use]] to repair damaged vehicle components highlighted by the players crosshair. The underwater welding torch holds less fuel than the standard welding torch, but can be operated while submerged in water. This equipment has a limited fuel capacity and cannot be refilled. This equipment can be stored on the back when not in use.
local: 按下 [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] 能装备/收起选中物品。按住 [$[action_equipment_use]] 来维修准星指向的载具部件。水下火旱枪比标准火旱枪携带更少的燃料，但是能够在水下工作。这个装备燃料有限而且不能补充。不使用时可以放在背后。

en: A large equipment storage unit containing an underwater welding torch.
local: 大型装备架，存储一个水下火旱枪 [译注:这游戏不支持han字...]

en: Pressing [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] will equip/store the selected item. Hold [$[action_equipment_use]] to repair damaged vehicle components highlighted by the players crosshair. This equipment has a limited fuel capacity and cannot be refilled. This equipment can be stored on the back when not in use.
local: 按下 [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] 能装备/收起选中物品。按住 [$[action_equipment_use]] 来维修准星指向的载具部件。这个装备燃料有限而且不能补充。不使用时可以放在背后。

en: A large equipment storage unit containing a welding torch.
local: 大型装备架，存储一个火旱枪 [译注:这游戏不支持han字...]

en: Pressing [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] will equip/store the selected item. Only large handheld equipment can be stored in this unit. When connected to an electric power source, any rechargable equipment stored in the unit will drain a small amount of electricity until recharged to 100% capacity.
local: 按下 [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] 能装备/收起选中物品。只有大型手持装备能够放在这个架子中。当连接到电源时，其内的装备可以得到充电。

en: An empty large equipment storage unit.

Pressing [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] will equip/store the selected outfit. Only specialist outfits can be stored in this unit. When connected to an electric power source, any rechargable outfits stored in the unit will drain a small amount of electricity until recharged to 100% capacity.
local: 如果你穿的是专业服装，按$[action_interact_left]/[$[action_interact_right]]将其储存在本单元中。

en: Pressing [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] will equip/store the outfit. When equipped, it will increase your temperature enough to survive in colder weather conditions. Its thermal effectiveness is reduced when wet.
local: 按 [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]]将装备/储存装备。装备后，它会使你的体温升高，足以在更冷的天气条件下生存。湿的时候它的热效率会降低。

en: An outfit inventory unit containing specialist thermal clothing for surviving Arctic temperatures.
local: 一种装备架，装有专门的保暖服，用于抵御北极的温度。

en: Pressing [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] will equip/store the outfit. When equipped, it will allow deep sea diving to a depth of 250m, and provides air for 10 minutes. The air tank can be refilled by storing the equipment in an outfit inventory unit.
local: 按 [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]]将装备/储存装备。如果装备，它将允许深海潜水到250米的深度，并提供10分钟的气体。可通过将设备存储在装备架单元中来重新填充气罐。

en: An outfit inventory unit containing specialist diving equipment.
local: 一个装备架，包含专业潜水设备。

en: Pressing [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] will equip/store outfit. When equipped, it will absorb 95% of damage dealt by fires.
local: 按 [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]]将装备/储存装备。装备后，它将吸收95%的火灾伤害。

en: An outfit inventory unit containing specialist firefighting gear.
local: 包含专业消防装备的装备架。

en: Pressing [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] will equip/store the outfit. When selected, press [$[action_equipment_use]] while falling to deploy the parachute. It will then open when you are falling fast enough. Press [$[action_equipment_secondary]] to close the parachute. This parachute is single-use once equipped but can be refolded by storing it in an outfit inventory unit.
local: 按 [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]]将装备/储存装备。装备后，在降落时按 [$[action_use_seat]] 将展开降落伞。当你下降得够快的时候它就会打开。再次按 [$[action_use_seat]] 将关闭它。这种降落伞一经装备就可以一次性使用，但可以通过储存在装备架单元中重新折叠。

en: An outfit inventory unit containing a single-use parachute.
local: 装有一次性降落伞的装备架。

en: Pressing [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] will equip/store the outfit. When equipped, it will allow diving to a depth of 50m, and provides air for 2 minutes. The air tank can be refilled by storing the gear in an outfit inventory unit.
local: 按[$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]]将装备/储存装备。如果装备，它将允许潜水到50米的深度，并提供2分钟的气体。储气罐可以通过将装备储存在装备架单元中来补充。

en: An outfit inventory unit containing specialist scuba gear.
local: 一个装备架，包含专业的潜水装备。

en: Pressing [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] will equip/store the selected item. Only small handheld equipment can be stored in this unit. When connected to an electric power source, any rechargable equipment stored in the unit will drain a small amount of electricity until recharged to 100% capacity.
local: 按下 [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] 能装备/收起选中物品。只有小型手持装备能够放在这个架子中。当连接到电源时，其内的装备可以得到充电。

en: An empty small equipment storage unit.
This is part of a set of modular jet engine components. Combustion will begin when the internal pressure is high enough.
local: 这是一套模块化喷气发动机部件的一部分。当内部压力足够高时，燃烧开始。

en: A combustion chamber that burns jet fuel to sustain a jet engine.
local: 燃烧喷气燃料以维持喷气发动机的燃烧室。

en: Jet fuel input required for combustion.
local: 燃烧所需的喷气燃料输入。

en: The pressure of air transferred by the chamber.
The temperature of air transferred by the chamber.
The rotations per second generated by the chamber.
This is part of a set of modular jet engine components. Electrical power is required to begin compression.
local: 这是一套模块化喷气发动机部件的一部分。开始压缩需要电力。

en: A compressor that compresses air within a jet engine.
local: 压缩喷气发动机内气体的压缩机。

en: Electrical input for starting the compressor.
local: 启动压缩机的电气输入。

en: The pressure of air transferred by the compressor.
local: 压缩机输送的气体压力。

en: The temperature of air transferred by the compressor.
local: 压缩机输送气体的温度。

en: The rotations per second generated by the compressor.
local: 压缩机每秒产生的旋转。

en: An angled section of ducting for use in jet engines.
local: 喷气发动机用的有角度的管道部分。

en: An cross section of ducting for use in jet engines.
local: 喷气发动机用十字管道。

en: A diagonal section of ducting for use in jet engines.
local: 喷气发动机用的斜截面管道。

en: An straight section of ducting for use in jet engines.
local: 喷气发动机用的一段直的管道。

en: A T-shaped section of ducting for use in jet engines.
local: 喷气发动机用的T形管道。

en: This is part of a set of modular jet engine components. Thrust will be produced at the back of the exhaust proportional to the internal RPS of the engine. Additional thrust is produced when the afterburner is active, at the cost of increased fuel consumption.
local: 这是一套模块化喷气发动机部件的一部分。推力将在排气后部产生，与发动机的内部转速成比例。当加力燃烧室启动时，会产生额外的推力，以增加燃料消耗为代价。

en: A jet engine exhaust that can burn additional fuel for increased output.
local: 一种喷气发动机的排气装置，可以燃烧额外的燃料以增加输出。

en: Jet fuel input to the afterburner.
local: 加力燃烧室的喷气燃料输入。

en: The pressure of air into the exhaust.
local: 气体进入排气管的压力。

en: The temperature of air into the exhaust.
local: 进入排气管的气体温度。

en: The air flow spoiler for reducing effective thrust from the exhaust. Takes value 0 (no reduction in thrust) to 1 (total reduction in thrust).
local: 用于减少排气有效推力的气流扰流器。将值0(不减小推力)设置为1(总减小推力)。

en: This is part of a set of modular jet engine components. Thrust will be produced at the back of the exhaust proportional to the internal RPS of the engine.
local: 这是一套模块化喷气发动机部件的一部分。推力将在排气后部产生，与发动机的内部转速成比例。

en: A jet engine exhaust that will produce thrust.
local: 产生推力的喷气发动机排气。

en: The pressure of air into the exhaust.
local: 气体进入排气管的压力。

en: The temperature of air into the exhaust.
local: 进入排气管的气体温度。

en: The air flow spoiler for reducing effective thrust from the exhaust. Takes value 0 (no reduction in thrust) to 1 (total reduction in thrust).
local: 用于减少排气有效推力的气流扰流器。将值0(不减小推力)设置为1(总减小推力)。

en: This is part of a set of modular jet engine components. Thrust will be produced at the back of the exhaust proportional to the internal RPS of the engine. The direction of the thrust is controlled using a standard value that sets the target orientation within the pivot's range of motion of -0.5 to 0.5 turns.
local: 这是一套模块化喷气发动机部件的一部分。推力将在排气后部产生，与发动机的内部转速成比例。使用标准值控制推力方向，该值将目标方向设置在枢轴-0.5到0.5圈的运动范围内。

en: A jet engine exhaust that has a built-in mechanical pivot.
local: 一种内置机械枢轴的喷气发动机排气装置。

en: The pressure of air into the exhaust.
local: 气体进入排气管的压力。

en: The temperature of air into the exhaust.
local: 进入排气管的气体温度。

en: The air flow spoiler for reducing effective thrust from the exhaust. Takes value 0 (no reduction in thrust) to 1 (total reduction in thrust).
local: 用于减少排气有效推力的气流扰流器。将值0(不减小推力)设置为1(总减小推力)。

en: The standard value setting the orientation within the range of motion.
local: 在运动范围内设置方向的标准值。

en: Electrical input to power the exhaust's pivot.
local: 为排气枢轴提供动力的电气输入。

en: The intake has turbo fans that will provide additional thrust. The intake will provide a greater air flow when travelling through the air.
local: 进气有涡轮风扇，可以提供额外的推力。当通过气体时，进气口将提供更大的气体流量。

en: A large intake that will suck air into a jet engine.
local: 将气体吸入喷气发动机的大进气口。

en: The pressure of air transferred by the intake.
local: 进气口所传递的气体压力。

en: The rotations per second generated by the intake.
local: 每秒由进气产生的旋转。

en: This is part of a set of modular jet engine components. The intake will provide a greater air flow when travelling through the air.
local: 这是一套模块化喷气发动机部件的一部分。当通过气体时，进气口将提供更大的气体流量。

en: A small intake that will suck air into a jet engine.
local: 将气体吸入喷气发动机的小进气口。

en: The pressure of air transferred by the intake.
local: 进气口所传递的气体压力。

en: The rotations per second generated by the intake.
local: 每秒由进气产生的旋转。

en: This is part of a set of modular jet engine components. This turbine has a torque connection for manually starting using an electric motor, or for powering additional props and generators.
local: 这是一套模块化喷气发动机部件的一部分。该涡轮机有一个扭矩连接，用于使用电动机手动启动，或为附加支柱和发电机供电。

en: A medium turbine that will convert air pressure to RPS within a jet engine.
local: 将气体压力转换为喷气发动机内转速的中等涡轮。

en: The pressure of air transferred by the turbine.
The temperature of air transferred by the turbine.
The rotations per second generated by the turbine.
The electric connection to output electric energy.
This is part of a set of modular jet engine components.
local: 这是一套模块化喷气发动机部件的一部分。

en: A small turbine that will convert air pressure to RPS within a jet engine.
local: 将气体压力转换为喷气发动机内转速的小涡轮。

en: The pressure of air transferred by the turbine.
The temperature of air transferred by the turbine.
The rotations per second generated by the turbine.
The electric connection to output electric energy.

You can attach to the ladder by pressing [$[action_use_seat]], then detach again by pressing either [$[action_use_seat]] or [$[action_jump]]. You will automatically detach from the ladder when you reach the top.
local: 您可以按[$[action_use_seat]]连接收到梯子，然后按[$[action_use_seat]]或[$[action_jump]]再次分离。到达顶部时，您将自动从梯子上分离。

en: Single ladder rung. Multiple rungs can placed on top of each other to form a ladder of abitrary length.
local: 单梯横档。多个横档可以相互叠放，形成一个任意长度的梯子。

en: Ideal for attaching to helicopters to allow them to land on the ocean.
local: 非常适合安装在直升机上，使其能够在海上降落。

en: Power received from an engine affects the forward and backward force generated. This propeller will only operate underwater.
local: 从发动机接收到的功率影响所产生的前进和后退力。这个螺旋桨只能在水下工作。

en: Receives power generated by an engine.
local: 接收发动机产生的能量。

en: Two standard number inputs control the rotor's swashplate, allowing you to affect the its pitch and roll. Power received from an engine affects the amount of up and down force that the rotor will generate. The output force of this rotor is decreased when underwater.
local: 两个标准数字输入控制螺旋桨的旋转斜盘，允许您影响其俯仰(Pitch)和侧倾。从发动机接收到的功率影响螺旋桨将产生的上下力的大小。在水下时，该螺旋桨的输出力减小。

en: A helicopter rotor with controllable pitch and roll.
local: 具有可控制的俯仰(Pitch)和偏转(Roll)的直升机旋翼。

en: Standard value between -1 and 1 representing the desired roll amount.
local: 介于-1和1之间的标准值，表示偏转(Roll)角。

en: Standard value between -1 and 1 representing the desired pitch amount.
local: 介于-1和1之间的标准值，表示俯仰(Pitch)角。

en: Receives power generated by an engine.
local: 接收发动机产生的能量。

en: Standard value between -1 and 1 representing the desired pitch amount.
local: 介于-1和1之间的标准值，表示总距。

en: A beacon that produces a laser point light, visible by laser point sensors.
local: 产生激光点光源的信标，由激光点传感器可见。

en: Switches the beacon on when receiving an on signal.
local: 接收到接通信号时打开信标。

en: The specific light wavelength to emit (whole number).
local: 要发射的特定光波长(整数)。

en: The reading can be read from the sensor's number output and is measured in metres (1 metre = 4 blocks).
local: 可以从传感器的数字输出中读取读数，并以米(1米=4块)为单位进行测量。

en: A laser distance sensor with a maximum measurement range of 4000m.
local: 最大测量范围为2000米的激光距离传感器。

en: The measured distance in metres, up to 2000m.
local: 以米为单位测量的距离，可达2000米。

en: Controls whether or not the laser is active.
The specific light wavelength to emit (whole number).
local: 要发射的特定光波长(整数)。

en: The closest point to the center of the sensor's field of view will be reported. It outputs a value of -1 to 1 on composite number channel 1 for the x position, and a value of -1 to 1 on composite number channel 2 for the y position. Composite on/off channel 1 is set to on when a point is visible. The -1 to 1 values map to an fov of -cos(0.5) to cos(0.5) in both the x and y directions.
local: 将报告距离传感器视场中心最近的点。它在x位置的复合编号通道1上输出-1到1的值，在y位置的复合编号通道2上输出-1到1的值。当点可见时，复合开/关通道1设置为开。在x和y方向，-1到1的值映射到-cos(0.5)到cos(0.5)的fov。

en: A sensor that outputs a relative x and y position of a laser point that it can see within its field of view.
local: 一种传感器，输出激光点的相对x和y位置，在其视场内可以看到。

en: On/Off channel 1: is laser detected. Number channel 1, 2: X, Y position within the sensors 120 degree field of view.
local: 打开/关闭通道1：检测到激光。数字通道1，2:X，Y在传感器120度视野内的位置。

en: The specific light wavelength to detect (whole number).
local: 要检测的特定光波长(整数)。

en: You can build the track using the Linear Track Extension component. This base component provides 3 blocks that can be built on. A pair of on/off signals allow you to control the up and down motion of the slider, and a numerical output lets you measure the slider's offset from its starting position. Multiple slider bases can run along the same track. The up/down speed can be configured by selecting this component with the select tool.
local: 可以使用“线性轨迹扩展”组件构建轨迹。这个基本组件提供了3个可以构建的块。一对开/关信号允许您控制滑块的上下运动，一个数字输出允许您测量滑块从其起始位置的偏移。多个滑块底座可以沿同一轨迹运行。可通过使用选择工具选择该部件来配置上升/下降速度。

en: A slider that moves along a modular linear track.
local: 沿模块化线性轨道移动的滑块。

en: Moves the slider in the track's down direction (indicated by the hollow arrow).
local: 沿轨迹的向下方向移动滑块(由空心箭头指示)。

en: Moves the slider in the track's up direction (indicated by the filled arrow).
local: 沿轨迹的向上方向移动滑块(由实心箭头指示)。

en: The measured offset of the slider from its starting position.
local: 滑块相对于其起始位置的测量偏移量。

en: Power connection for transfering mechanical energy.
local: 用于传输机械能的连接。
用于输送流体的流体连接。

en: You can build the track using the Compact Linear Track Extension component. The speed of the slider can be set using its number input.
local: 可以使用“紧凑线性轨迹扩展”组件构建轨迹。滑块的速度可以使用其数字输入设置。

en: A compact slider that moves along a modular linear track.
local: 沿模块化线性轨道移动的紧凑滑块。

en: A Compact Linear Track Base must be attached somewhere along the track for it to function.
local: 一个紧凑的线性轨道基座必须附着在轨道的某处，使其发挥作用。

en: An extension piece that can be used to build compact linear tracks.
local: 一种可用来建造紧凑的直线轨道的延长件。

en: Power connection for transfering mechanical energy.
local: 用于传输机械能的连接。
用于输送流体的流体连接。

en: A standard value input sets the target position that the piston rod should move to. There is also an output for taking a measurement of the rod's current position. The piston can expand by a length of 1 metre, making it a total of 2.25m (9 blocks) tall when expanded and 1.25m (5 blocks) tall when contracted. The piston's speed can be configured by selecting it with the select tool.
local: 标准值输入设置活塞杆应移动到的目标位置。还有一个输出用于测量杆的当前位置。活塞可膨胀1米，膨胀时总高度为2。25米(9块)，收缩时总高度为1。25米(5块)。活塞的速度可以通过选择工具进行配置。

en: A pneumatic piston that can be expanded and contracted.
local: 可以膨胀和收缩的气动活塞。

en: Takes a standard value representing the desired position of the rod.
local: 获取表示所需杆位置的标准值。

en: The measured position of the rod between -0.5 and 0.5 metres.
local: 杆的测量位置在-0.5米到0.5米之间。
用于输送流体的流体连接。

en: A Linear Track Base must be attached somewhere along the track for it to function.
local: 一个线性的轨道基地必须附在轨道上的某个地方，它才能发挥作用。

en: An extension piece that can be used to build linear tracks.
local: 可用于建立线性轨迹的延长件。

en: This sensor outputs the speed of the component in one of 4 modes. Modes can be changed by selecting the sensor.
local: 此传感器以四种模式之一输出部件的速度。可以通过选择传感器来更改模式。

en: This sensor outputs its current linear speed in m/s, allowing you to measure how fast your vehicle is travelling.
local: 该传感器以m/s为单位输出当前的线性速度，允许您测量载具的行驶速度。

en: The sensor's linear speed in m/s.
While the connector is active the end will glow and it will stick to most surfaces that it touches. The connection will break if enough stress (200) is applied.
local: 当连接件处于活动状态时，末端将发光，并将粘住其接触的大多数曲面。如果施加足够的应力(200)，连接将断开。

en: A small connector that will attach to most surfaces.
local: 连接收到大多数表面的小连接头。

en: Enables the connector's magnet when receiving an on signal.
local: 在接收到接通信号时启用连接头的磁铁。

en: Outputs an on signal if the connector is attached to another connector.
local: 如果连接头连接收到另一个连接头，则输出接通信号。

en: Outputs the current force stress on the connector.
local: 输出连接头上的电流应力。

en: A simple microphone that picks up voice data from nearby players. (Range : 15)
local: 一个简单的麦克风，可以从附近的玩家中提取语音数据。(范围：15)

en: A microphone for transmitting player voice data.
local: 传送玩家声音数据的麦克风。

en: If the microphone is currently transmitting.

local: 模块化发动机气体歧管

en: Attach a manifold to a cylinder to provide a connection for air to that cylinder. Cylinders that are chained directly adjacent to each other can share a single manifold.
local: 将歧管连接到气缸上，为气缸提供气体连接。彼此直接相邻的气缸可以共享一个歧管。
模块化发动机气体歧管

en: Port used to allow air in and out of a fluid system.
local: 只允许气体进出某一流体系统的端口。

en: Allows fluid to flow in and out of an enclosed volume.
local: 允许气体进出某一封闭空间。
模块化发动机交流发电机

en: Alternators convert mechanical energy from a Drive Belt into electric charge.
local: 将歧管连接到气缸上，为该气缸提供气体、燃料和排气的连接。彼此直接相邻的气缸可以共用一个歧管。
一个模块化的发动机歧管。

en: Attach a clutch to a crankshaft block to control the torque made available to the connected system.
local: 将飞轮连接到曲轴缸体上，将曲轴中的动力转化为可用的扭矩，用于驱动其他部件。
一个模块化的发动机飞轮。

en: The power supplied by the engine for inputting to other components.
local: 由发动机提供的动力输入到其他部件。

en: Attach a clutch to a crankshaft block to control the torque made available to the connected system.
local: 将飞轮连接到曲轴缸体上，将曲轴中的功率转换为驱动其他部件的可用扭矩。

en: The power supplied by the engine for inputting to other components.
Attach a clutch to a crankshaft block to control the torque made available to the connected system.
local: 将飞轮连接到曲轴缸体上，将曲轴中的功率转换为驱动其他部件的可用扭矩。

en: The power supplied by the engine for inputting to other components.

local: 模块化发动机冷却液歧管

en: Attach a manifold to a cylinder to provide a connection for coolant to that cylinder. Cylinders that are chained directly adjacent to each other can share a single manifold.
local: 将歧管连接到气缸上，为该气缸提供气体、燃料和排气的连接。彼此直接相邻的气缸可以共用一个歧管。
一个模块化的发动机歧管。

en: The crankshaft is the core of an engine. Attach cylinders to the outer surfaces to generate power. Multiple crankshaft blocks can be placed adajcent to each other to form larger engines.
local: 曲轴是发动机的核心。将气缸连接到外表面产生动力，连接飞轮将产生的动力作为扭矩传递。多个曲轴组可以互相对置，形成较大的发动机。
模块化发动机曲轴缸体

en: Output value giving data info on engine speed.
local: 输出值提供发动机转速的数据信息。

en: The crankshaft is the core of an engine. Attach cylinders to the outer surfaces to generate power. Multiple crankshaft blocks can be placed adajcent to each other to form larger engines.
local: 曲轴是发动机的核心。将气缸连接到外表面产生动力，连接飞轮将产生的动力作为扭矩传递。多个曲轴组可以互相对置，形成较大的发动机。

local: 输出值提供发动机转速的数据信息。

local: 输出值提供发动机转速的数据信息。

en: Attach a cylinder to a crankshafts outer surface to produce power for an engine. The cylinder requires a manifold to move air, fuel, and exhaust through the cylinder. Cylinders that are chained directly adjacent to each other can share a single manifold.
local:
将气缸连接到曲轴外表面，为发动机提供动力。气缸需要一个歧管，使气体、燃料和废气通过气缸。直接相邻的汽缸可以共用一个歧管。

def_multibody_compact_pivot_robotic_a_name		Compact Robotic Pivot	紧凑型机械枢轴
def_multibody_compact_pivot_robotic_a_desc		The pivot has a range of motion of 0.25 turns in both directions. A standard input value sets the target orientation within the pivot's range of motion. The pivot's speed can be configured by selecting it with the select tool.	枢轴在两个方向上的运动范围为0.25圈。标准输入值设置轴运动范围内的目标方向。轴的速度可以通过使用选择工具选择来配置。

def_multibody_door_hinge_a_name		Robotic Door Hinge	自动门铰链
def_multibody_door_hinge_a_desc		The hinge has a range of motion of 0.25 in each direction. A standard input value sets the target orientation within the pivot's range of motion. The measured rotation of the hinge can be read from its output. The hinge's speed can be configured by selecting it with the select tool.	铰链在一个方向上的运动范围为0.25圈。标准输入值设置轴运动范围内的目标方向。铰链的旋转测量值可以从其输出中读取。铰链的速度可以通过选择工具进行配置。

def_multibody_velocity_pivot_a_name		Velocity Pivot	速度轴
def_multibody_velocity_pivot_a_desc		Inputting a value of 0 will cause it to stop. The pivot's current rotation can be read from its output. An output of 1 corresponds to one full turn, and -1 to a full turn in the opposite direction.	输入值0将导致它停止。可以从输出中读取轴的当前旋转。1的输出对应于一整圈，而-1对应于相反方向的整圈。
def_multibody_velocity_pivot_a_s_desc		A pivot that will continuously rotate at a set input speed.	以设定的输入速度连续旋转的轴。

def_no_sleep_name		Keep Active Block	保持活动块
def_no_sleep_desc		When on a vehicle, the vehicle will not despawn when out of range.	在载具上时，载具在超出范围时不会报废。
def_no_sleep_s_desc		A keep alive marking block.	保持活动块
def_parachute_name		Vehicle Parachute	载具降落伞
def_parachute_desc		The parachute will deploy when receiving an on signal, and will close when not. Once deployed, it will open at a speed of 20m/s and stall when it drops below 5m/s. Once opened, the single use will be consumed and it must be returned to a workbench to be refolded. The size of the parachute can be customised by selecting this component with the select tool.	降落伞会在收到接通信号时展开，否则会关闭。一旦展开，以20米/秒的速度打开，低于5米/秒时失速，打开后一次性消耗，必须返回工作台重新折叠。降落伞的大小可以通过使用选择工具选择该组件来定制。
def_parachute_s_desc		A single-use parachute that can be deployed to reduce a vehicle's velocity.	降落伞一种一次性降落伞，可以用来降低载具的速度。
def_parachute_node_0_label		Deploy	部署
def_parachute_node_0_desc		Deploy the parachute. The parachute will close when it stalls or stops receiving an on signal.	打开降落伞。当降落伞停转或停止接收接通信号时，降落伞将关闭。
def_passenger_seat_name		Passenger Seat (Deprecated)	乘客座椅(已弃用)
def_passenger_seat_desc		You can get in and out of the seat by interacting with it using [$[action_use_seat]]. You can place a rescued survivor in any seat by using [$[action_use_seat]] while carrying them.	您可以通过使用 [$[action_use_seat]]与座椅交互来进出座椅。您可以在携带获救幸存者时使用 [$[action_use_seat]]将其放置在任何座位上。
def_passenger_seat_s_desc		A basic passenger seat.	基本的乘客座位。
def_passenger_seat_node_0_label		Occupied	占用
def_passenger_seat_node_0_desc		Outputs an on signal if this seat is occupied by a character.	如果这个座位被一个角色占用，则输出一个接通信号。
def_physics_flooder_name		Physics Flooder	物理体积注入器
def_physics_flooder_desc		Floods an enclosed volume with massless physics, allowing for physics shape optimisation without comprimising vehicle integrity.	用无质量物理体积淹没封闭体积，允许物理形状优化而不影响载具完整性。
def_physics_flooder_s_desc		A device that floods an enclosed volume with physics for optimisation.	一种在封闭的空间中注入物理效果以优化的装置。
def_player_sensor_name		Player Sensor	玩家传感器
def_player_sensor_desc		If the sensor is facing into a sealed room, only players inside that room will be detected. Likewise, players inside sealed rooms will not be detected if the sensor is placed on the outside. The size of the area and types of players to detect can be changed by selecting this component with the select tool.	如果传感器朝向一个密封的房间，则只会检测到该房间内的玩家。同样，如果传感器放在室外，则不会检测到密封房间内的玩家。可以通过使用选择工具选择此组件来更改要检测的区域大小和玩家类型。
def_player_sensor_s_desc		A sensor that outputs the number of players detected within an area.	一种传感器，输出在一个区域内检测到的玩家数量。
def_player_sensor_node_0_label		Number Detected	检测到个数
def_player_sensor_node_0_desc		The number of players detected by the sensor.	传感器检测到的玩家数量。
def_player_sensor_node_1_label		Detected	检测
def_player_sensor_node_1_desc		Outputs an on signal if any players are detected.	如果检测到任何玩家，则输出打开信号。
def_pressure_sensor_name		Contact Sensor	接触传感器
def_pressure_sensor_desc		Setting the resistance property will tune the amount of contact required to depress the sensor. When depressed, an on signal will be produced.	设置调整按下传感器所需的接触压力。 当按下时，将产生一个开信号。
def_pressure_sensor_s_desc		A sensor activated by contact pressure.	由接触压力触发的传感器
def_pressure_sensor_node_0_label		Output	输出
def_pressure_sensor_node_0_desc		Outputs an on signal when the contact sensor is depressed.	当传感器被按下时输出一个on信号
def_propeller_name		Small Propeller	小螺旋桨
def_propeller_desc		Power received from an engine affects the forward and backward force generated. This propeller will only operate underwater.	从发动机接收到的功率影响所产生的前进和后退力。这个螺旋桨只能在水下工作。
def_propeller_s_desc		A small boat propeller.	小船的螺旋桨。
def_propeller_node_0_label		RPS	动力
def_propeller_node_0_desc		Receives power generated by an engine.	接收发动机产生的能量。
def_radar_name		Radar	雷达
def_radar_desc		This sensor outputs the distance and angle to a detected object within its range and field of view using radio waves. (Range : 5000) (Max FOV : 0.125)	此传感器使用无线电波将距离和角度输出到其范围和视场内的被检测对象。(射程：5000)(最大视场：0.125)
def_radar_s_desc		A short range Radar that returns information about a detected object within its view.	一种短程雷达，能在其视野内返回有关被探测物体的信息。
def_radar_node_0_label		FOV	FOV
def_radar_node_0_desc		The sensor's yaw field of view in turns from 0.01 to 0.125.	传感器的FOV从0.01到0.125。
def_radar_node_1_label		Facing Yaw	朝向偏角
def_radar_node_1_desc		The sensor's yaw direction in turns from -0.5 to 0.5.	传感器的偏角方向从-0.5到0.5。
def_radar_node_2_label		Target Distance	目标距离
def_radar_node_2_desc		The distance to the target in meters.	到目标的距离，单位为米。
def_radar_node_3_label		Signal Strength	信号强度
def_radar_node_3_desc		The strength of the returned signal.	返回信号的强度。
def_radar_node_4_label		Elevation Angle	仰角
def_radar_node_4_desc		The pitch angle between the sensor and the target in turns.	传感器和目标之间的俯仰(Pitch)角。
def_radar_node_5_label		Target Found	找到目标
def_radar_node_5_desc		Returns if an object has been detected.	返回是否检测到对象。
def_radar_node_6_label		Electric	电源
def_radar_node_6_desc		Electrical power connection.	电源连接。
def_radar_detector_name		Radar Detector	雷达探测器
def_radar_detector_desc		This sensor outputs an On signal when it detects a radio wave.	当侦测到一个反射雷达波(原文radio wave,上下文联想)时输出一个on信号"

en: A sensor that can detect radar waves.
Returns an On signal when it detects a radio wave.
local: 当检测到反射雷达波时输出on信号

en: This fixed sensor outputs the distance and angle to a detected object within its range and field of view using radio waves. (Range : 20000) (Max FOV : 0.125)
local: 这个固定传感器使用无线电波将距离和角度输出到被探测物体的范围和视场内。(射程：20000)(最大视场：0.125)

en: A medium range, fixed rotation Radar that returns information about a detected object within its view.
local: 一种中程固定雷达，返回在其视野内探测到的物体的信息。

en: The sensor's yaw field of view in turns from 0.01 to 0.125.
The distance to the target in meters.
local: 到目标的距离，单位为米。

en: The strength of the returned signal.
The pitch angle between the sensor and the target in turns.
local: 传感器和目标之间的俯仰(Pitch)角。

en: Returns if an object has been detected.

This sensor outputs the distance and relative angles to up to 8 detected objects within its range and field of view using radio waves and outputs all detected targets through composite channels. (Range : 50000) (Max FOV : 0.125)
local: 该传感器使用无线电波输出其范围和视场内最多8个被检测对象的距离和相对角度，并通过复合信道输出所有被检测目标。(射程：50000)(最大视场：0.125)

en: A long range, multi-target Radar that returns detailed information through composite channels about detected objects within its view.
local: 多目标雷达一种远程多目标雷达，通过合成通道返回其视野内探测到的物体的详细信息。

en: The sensor's yaw field of view in turns from 0.01 to 0.125.
The sensor's yaw direction in turns from -0.5 to 0.5.
local: 传感器的偏角方向从-0.5到为0.5。

en: Outputs data for up to 8 targets. (On/Off 1-8 : Target Found) (Values 1-4 : Target 1 (Relative Distance, Signal Strength, Elevation Angle, Azimuth Angle)) (Values 5-8 : Target 2) Ect...
local: 输出多达8个目标的数据。(开/关1-8：找到目标)(值1-4：目标1(相对距离、信号强度、仰角、方位角))(值5-8：目标2)等...

en: This sensor outputs the distance and relative angles to a detected object within its range and field of view using radio waves. This sensor uniquely allows the changing of it's pitch direction. (Range : 20000) (Max FOV : 0.250)
local: 该传感器使用无线电波将距离和相对角度输出到被探测物体的范围和视场内。这个传感器唯一允许改变它的俯仰(Pitch)方向。(射程：20000)(最大视场：0.250)

en: A medium range, highly configurable Radar that returns detailed information about a detected object within its view.
local: 一种中程、高度可配置的雷达，能返回在其视野内探测到的物体的详细信息。

en: The sensor's yaw and pitch field of view in turns from 0.01 to 0.125.
The sensor's yaw direction in turns from -0.5 to 0.5.
local: 传感器的偏角方向从-0.5到为0.5。

en: The sensor's pitch direction in turns from -0.25 to 0.25.
local: 传感器的俯仰(Pitch)方向从-0.25到0.25。

en: The distance to the target in meters.
local: 到目标的距离，单位为米。

en: The strength of the returned signal.
The pitch angle between the sensor and the target in turns.
local: 传感器和目标之间的俯仰(Pitch)角。

en: The yaw angle between the sensor and the target in turns.
local: 传感器和目标之间的偏航(Yaw)角。

en: Returns if an object has been detected.
This sensor outputs the distance and angle to a detected underwater object within its range and field of view using sound waves. (Range : 3000) (Max FOV : 0.125)
local: 利用声波在选定角度和FOV内检测目标仰角和距离。(射程：3000)(最大视场：0.125)

en: A short range Sonar that returns information about a detected underwater object within its view.
local: 一种短程声纳，在其视野内返回有关探测到的水下物体的信息。

en: The sensor's yaw field of view in turns from 0.01 to 0.125.
The sensor's yaw direction in turns from -0.5 to 0.5.
local: 传感器的偏角方向从-0.5到为0.5。

en: The distance to the target in meters.

local: 测量它相对于水平倾斜多少的传感器。

local: 相对于水平的测量倾斜度。

en: Two standard number inputs control the rotor's swashplate, allowing you to affect the its pitch and roll. Power received from an engine affects the amount of up and down force that the rotor will generate. The output force of this rotor is decreased when underwater.
local: 两个数字输入控制旋翼的倾斜盘，允许您影响其俯仰Pitch和滚动Roll。从发动机接收到的功率影响旋翼将产生的上下作用力的大小。在水下时，螺旋桨的输出力减小。

en: A helicopter rotor with controllable pitch and roll.
local: 能够控制直升机俯仰、滚动的螺旋桨

en: Standard value between -1 and 1 representing the desired roll amount.
Standard value between -1 and 1 representing the desired pitch amount.
Receives power generated by an engine.
local: 接收来自发动机的动力

local: 它需要一个介于-1和1之间的数字输入，表示方向舵旋转的两个极值。

en: The rudder can be attached to the underside of a boat to control its yaw, allowing you to steer left and right.
local: 舵可以附在船的下侧以控制它的偏航(Yaw)，允许你左右控制舵。

local: 接受介于-1和1之间的值，该值表示方向舵旋转的两个极值。

local: 它需要一个介于-1和1之间的数字输入，表示鳍旋转的两个极值。

en: The fin rudder can be attached to the keel of a boat to control its yaw, allowing you to steer left and right.
local: 鳍舵可以附在船的龙骨上，以控制船的偏航(Yaw)，使你可以左右控制舵。

en: Accepts a value between -1 and 1 that represent the two extremes of the rudder's rotation.
local: 接受介于-1和1之间的值，该值表示方向舵旋转的两个极值。

en: An air intake component that performs better at higher velocity.
local: 在高速下表现更好的进气口组件

en: The light has a standard value input that sets the target orientation within the its range of motion. It can rotate a quarter turn in both directions. An on/off signal is used to switch the light on and off. It has a range of 120m.
local: 灯光有一个标准值输入，用于在其运动范围内设置目标方向。它可以在两个方向旋转四分之一圈。开关信号用于打开和关闭灯。它的射程是120米。

en: A spotlight that can be rotated up and down.
local: 可以上下旋转的聚光灯。

en: Controls whether or not the light is switched on.
Standard value between -1 and 1 representing the target orientation of the light.
local: 介于-1和1之间的标准值，表示灯光的目标方向。

en: A small spotlight that can be controlled using an on/off signal.
local: 一种可以用开/关信号控制的小聚光灯。

en: Controls whether or not the light is switched on.
A small spotlight that can be controlled using an on/off signal.
local: 一种可以用开/关信号控制的小聚光灯。

en: Controls whether or not the light is switched on.
It provides 4 number outputs that produce a standard value ranging from -1 to 1, and 6 on/off outputs. You can get in and out of the pilot seat by interacting with it using [$[action_use_seat]].
local: 它提供4个输出，产生从-1到1的标准值，以及6个开/关输出。您可以通过使用 [$[action_use_seat]]与飞行员座椅交互来进出。

en: The pilot seat lets you translate keyboard presses into output signals that can control logic components.
local: 飞行员座椅可以将键盘按键转换成可以控制逻辑元件的输出信号。

en: Outputs an on signal if this seat is occupied by a character.
local: 如果这个座位被一个角色占用，则输出一个接通信号。

en: Outputs a standard value between -1 and 1, controlled using [$[action_left]] and [$[action_right]]. [$[action_left]] causes the output value to move towards -1, and [$[action_right]] moves it towards 1.
local: 输出一个介于-1和1之间的标准值，使用[$[action_left]]和[$[action_right]]进行控制。[$[action_left]]使输出值向-1移动，[$[action_right]]将其向1移动。

en: Outputs a standard value between -1 and 1, controlled using [$[action_up]] and [$[action_down]]. [$[action_down]] causes the output value to move towards -1, and [$[action_up]] moves it towards 1.
local: 输出一个介于-1和1之间的标准值，使用[$[action_up]]和[$[action_down]]进行控制。[$[action_down]]使输出值向-1移动，[$[action_up]]将其向1移动。

en: Outputs a standard value between -1 and 1, controlled using [$[action_pedal_left]] and [$[action_pedal_right]]. [$[action_pedal_left]] causes the output value to move towards -1, and [$[action_pedal_right]] moves it towards 1.
local: 输出一个介于-1和1之间的标准值，使用 [$[action_pedal_left]] and [$[action_pedal_right]]进行控制。[$[action_pedal_left]]使输出值向-1移动，[$[action_pedal_right]]将其向1移动。

en: Outputs a standard value between -1 and 1, controlled using [$[action_throttle_up]] and [$[action_throttle_down]]. [$[action_throttle_down]] causes the output value to move towards -1, and [$[action_throttle_up]] moves it towards 1.
local: 输出一个介于-1和1之间的标准值，使用[$[action_throttle_up]]和[$[action_throttle_down]]进行控制。[$[action_throttle_down]]使输出值向-1移动，[$[action_throttle_up]]将其向1移动。

en: Outputs an on signal when [$[action_hotkey_1]] is held, and off when it is not.
local: 按住[$[action_hotkey_1]]时输出打开信号，不按住时输出关闭信号。

en: Outputs an on signal when [$[action_hotkey_2]] is held, and off when it is not.
local: 按住[$[action_hotkey_2]]时输出打开信号，不按住时输出关闭信号。

en: Outputs an on signal when [$[action_hotkey_3]] is held, and off when it is not.

en: Outputs an on signal when [$[action_hotkey_4]] is held, and off when it is not.
local: 按住[$[action_hotkey_4]]时输出打开信号，不按住时输出关闭信号。

en: Outputs an on signal when [$[action_hotkey_5]] is held, and off when it is not.
local: 在按住[$[action_hotkey_5]]时输出打开信号，在不按住时输出关闭信号。

en: Outputs an on signal when [$[action_hotkey_6]] is held, and off when it is not.
local: 在按住[$[action_hotkey_6]]时输出打开信号，在不按住时输出关闭信号。

en: Outputs the axis, hotkey and occupied data from the seat. (On/Off 1+ : Hotkeys) (On/Off 32 : Occupied) (Value 1 : [$[action_left]]/[$[action_right]]) (Value 2 : [$[action_up]]/[$[action_down]]) (Value 3 : [$[action_pedal_left]]/[$[action_pedal_right]]) (Value 4 : [$[action_throttle_up]]/[$[action_throttle_down]])
local: 从座椅输出轴、热键和占用数据。(开/关1+：热键)(开/关32：已占用)(值1:[$[action_left]/[$[action_right]](值2:[$[action_up]/[$[action_down]])(值3:[$[action_pedal_left]/[$[action_pedal_right]])(值4:[$[action_throttle_up]/[$[action_throttle_down]])

en: You can get in and out of the bed by interacting with it using [$[action_use_seat]]. You can place a rescued survivor in any bed by using [$[action_use_seat]] while carrying them.
local: 你可以通过使用[$[action_use_seat]]与之交互来上下床。你可以在携带幸存者时使用 [$[action_use_seat]]将获救的幸存者放置在任何床上。
