en: Outputs the axis, hotkey and occupied data from the seat. (On/Off 1+ : Hotkeys) (On/Off 32 : Occupied) (Value 1 : [$[action_left]]/[$[action_right]]) (Value 2 : [$[action_up]]/[$[action_down]]) (Value 3 : [$[action_pedal_left]]/[$[action_pedal_right]]) (Value 4 : [$[action_throttle_up]]/[$[action_throttle_down]])
local: 从座椅输出轴、热键和占用数据。(开/关1+：热键)(开/关32：已占用)(值1:[$[action_left]/[$[action_right]](值2:[$[action_up]/[$[action_down]])(值3:[$[action_pedal_left]/[$[action_pedal_right]])(值4:[$[action_throttle_up]/[$[action_throttle_down]])

en: You can get in and out of the medical bed by interacting with it using [$[action_use_seat]]. You can place a rescued survivor in any medical bed by using [$[action_use_seat]] while carrying them.
local: 你可以通过使用[$[action_use_seat]]与病床互动来进出病床。您可以在携带获救幸存者时使用 [$[action_use_seat]]将其放置在任何医疗床上。

en: A bed equiped with medical monitoring equipment.
local: 装有医疗监护设备的床。

en: Outputs an on signal if this bed is occupied by a character.
local: 如果这个床被一个角色占用，则输出一个打开信号。

en: You can get in and out of the seat by interacting with it using [$[action_use_seat]]. You can place a rescued survivor in any seat by using [$[action_use_seat]] while carrying them.
local: 您可以通过使用 [$[action_use_seat]]与座椅交互来进出座椅。您可以在携带获救幸存者时使用 [$[action_use_seat]]将其放置在任何座位上。
小的加厚垫的乘客座位。

en: Outputs an on signal if this seat is occupied by a character.
local: 如果这个座位被一个角色占用，则输出一个接通信号。

en: You can get in and out of the seat by interacting with it using [$[action_use_seat]]. You can place a rescued survivor in any seat by using [$[action_use_seat]] while carrying them.
local: 您可以通过使用 [$[action_use_seat]]与座椅交互来进出座椅。您可以在携带获救幸存者时使用 [$[action_use_seat]]将其放置在任何座位上。

en: Outputs an on signal if this seat is occupied by a character.
local: 如果这个座位被一个角色占用，则输出一个接通信号。

en: It provides 4 number outputs that produce a standard value ranging from -1 to 1, and 6 on/off outputs. You can get in and out of the driver seat by interacting with it using [$[action_use_seat]].
local: 它提供4个输出，产生从-1到1的标准值，以及6个开/关输出。您可以通过使用[[$[action_use_seat]]与驾驶员座椅交互来进出驾驶员座椅。

en: The driver seat lets you translate keyboard presses into output signals that can control logic components.
local: 驾驶员座椅允许您将键盘按键转换为可以控制逻辑组件的输出信号。

en: Outputs an on signal if this seat is occupied by a character.
local: 如果这个座位被一个角色占用，则输出一个接通信号。

en: Outputs a standard value between -1 and 1, controlled using [$[action_left]] and [$[action_right]]. [$[action_left]] causes the output value to move towards -1, and [$[action_right]] moves it towards 1.
local: 输出一个介于-1和1之间的标准值，使用[$[action_left]]和[$[action_right]]进行控制。[$[action_left]]使输出值向-1移动，[$[action_right]]将其向1移动。

en: Outputs a standard value between -1 and 1, controlled using [$[action_up]] and [$[action_down]]. [$[action_down]] causes the output value to move towards -1, and [$[action_up]] moves it towards 1.
local: 输出一个介于-1和1之间的标准值，使用[$[action_up]]和[$[action_down]]进行控制。[$[action_down]]使输出值向-1移动，[$[action_up]]将其向1移动。

en: Outputs a standard value between -1 and 1, controlled using [$[action_pedal_left]] and [$[action_pedal_right]]. [$[action_pedal_left]] causes the output value to move towards -1, and [$[action_pedal_right]] moves it towards 1.
local: 输出一个介于-1和1之间的标准值，使用 [$[action_pedal_left]] and [$[action_pedal_right]]进行控制。[$[action_pedal_left]]使输出值向-1移动，[$[action_pedal_right]]将其向1移动。

en: Outputs a standard value between -1 and 1, controlled using [$[action_throttle_up]] and [$[action_throttle_down]]. [$[action_throttle_down]] causes the output value to move towards -1, and [$[action_throttle_up]] moves it towards 1.
local: 输出一个介于-1和1之间的标准值，使用[$[action_throttle_up]]和[$[action_throttle_down]]进行控制。[$[action_throttle_down]]使输出值向-1移动，[$[action_throttle_up]]将其向1移动。

en: Outputs an on signal when [$[action_hotkey_1]] is held, and off when it is not.
local: 按住[$[action_hotkey_1]]时输出打开信号，不按住时输出关闭信号。

en: You can get in and out of the stretcher by interacting with it using [$[action_use_seat]]. You can place a rescued survivor in any stretcher by using [$[action_use_seat]] while carrying them.
local: 您可以通过使用 [$[action_use_seat]]与担架交互来进出担架。您可以使用 [$[action_use_seat]]将获救的幸存者放在担架上。

en: A strecher that connects below an attachment point.
local: 连接在连接点下面的一种拉紧器。

en: Outputs an on signal if this bed is occupied by a character.
local: 如果这个床被一个角色占用，则输出一个打开信号。

en: This block has a paintable surface where small grid squares can be painted individually. Use additive painting mode to paint the backlight grid. The backlight can be enabled by using an on signal and a name can be set with the select tool that will be visible when the indicator is looked at by a player.
local: 这个块有一个可绘制的表面，在那里可以单独绘制小的网格正方形。使用附加绘制模式绘制背光网格。背光可以通过使用打开信号启用，并且可以使用选择工具设置名称，当玩家查看指示灯时，该工具将可见。

en: A backlit indicator for displaying painted detail.
local: 一种背光指示器，用于显示绘制的细节。

en: Switches the backlight on when receiving an on signal.
local: 接收到打开信号时，打开背光。

en: This block has a paintable surface where small grid squares can be painted individually.
local: 这个块有一个可绘制的表面，在那里可以单独绘制小的网格正方形。

en: Sign block for displaying painted detail.
local: 用于显示涂漆细节的标志块。

en: This component has low friction moving along its length, but grips laterally.
local: 该部件沿其长度移动时摩擦力很低，但会横向夹紧。

en: Accepts a value between -1 and 1 that represents the extremes of the steering rotation.
local: 接受一个介于-1和1之间的值，该值表示转向旋转的极值值。

en: This component has low friction moving along its length, but grips laterally.
local: 该部件沿其长度移动时摩擦力很低，但会横向夹紧。

en: Accepts a value between -1 and 1 that represents the extremes of the steering rotation.
local: 接受一个介于-1和1之间的值，该值表示转向旋转的极值值。

en: A basic light that can be controlled using an on/off signal.
local: 一种可以用开关信号控制的基本光。

en: Controls whether or not the light is switched on.

Three channels of the composite input can be used to set the red, green and blue components of the light's color using numbers between 0 and 1. The light can also operate in HSV mode, where the 3 inputs correspond to the hue, saturation and value (brightness) of the color between 0 and 1. The color mode and input channels can be customised by selecting this component with the select tool.
local: 组合输入的三个通道可用于使用0到1之间的数字设置灯光颜色的红色、绿色和蓝色分量。灯光也可以在HSV模式下工作，其中3个输入对应于0到1之间颜色的色调、饱和度和值(亮度)。颜色模式和输入通道可以通过使用选择工具选择此组件进行自定义。

en: An advanced light that can be controlled using a microcontroller.
local: 一种可以用微控制器控制的先进光源。

en: Composite link containing the light's color data.
local: 包含灯光颜色数据的复合链接。

en: The cell generates electrical current based on time of day and angle towards the sun.
local: 电池根据一天中的时间和太阳的角度产生电流。

en: A solar cell for generating electricity.
local: 用于发电的太阳能电池。

en: The electric connection to output electric energy.
Fuel can be stacked to increase the burn duration of a rocket booster.
local: 燃料可以堆积起来以增加火箭助推器的燃烧时间。

local: 巨大的固体火箭燃料块。

local: 一种中等固体火箭燃料段。

en: Additional fuel can be stacked on top of the booster to increase its burn duration. The burn rate can be set in the component's properties, with slower burn rates producing less thrust.

local: 一个可以堆叠成楼梯的踏板。

local: 一种台阶，可用于楼梯顶部，使其与平台平齐。

en: A standard number input allows you to control how much force the rotor generates.
local: 标准数字输入允许您控制螺旋桨产生的力。
一种基本的直升机尾桨。

en: Receives power generated by an engine.
local: 接收发动机产生的能量。

en: Standard value between -1 and 1 representing the desired yaw amount.
local: 标准值介于-1和1之间，表示所需的偏航(Yaw)量。

en: A sensor that outputs the current ambient air temperature at its location in Celsius.
local: 输出当前环境气体温度的传感器。
用来测定温度的传感器。

en: The number input controls the amount of power transmitted.
local: 数字输入控制传输的功率。

en: A clutch for managing the transmission of power between two nodes.
local: 用于管理两个节点之间的功率传输的离合器。

en: A number between 0 and 1 representing the clutch engagement factor.
local: 介于0和1之间的数字，表示离合器接合系数。

en: The electric connection to power the component.
local: 为部件供电的电气连接。

en: The ratio can be toggled between two values which can be set in the properties.
local: 可以在属性中设置的两个值之间切换比率。

en: Gearbox for changing the torque and speed across power connections.
local: 变速箱，用于改变动力连接的扭矩和速度。

en: Toggle between the two gear ratios.
local: 在两个传动比之间切换。

en: The electric connection to power the component.
local: 为部件供电的电气连接。

en: The ratio can be toggled between two values which can be set in the properties. This gearbox operates up to a torque difference of 4000.
local: 可以在属性中设置的两个值之间切换比率。

en: Gearbox for changing the torque and speed across power connections.
local: 变速箱，用于改变动力连接的扭矩和速度。

en: Toggle between the two gear ratios.
local: 在两个传动比之间切换。

en: The electric connection to power the component.
local: 为部件供电的电气连接。

en: Measures the torque and rotations per second in the connected power network.
local: 测量连接的电网中每秒的转矩和旋转。

en: A sensor for reading torque and rotations per second.
local: 用于读取扭矩和每秒旋转的传感器。

en: The rotations per second of the power system.
The torque reading from the power system.
Number input to set the level of braking applied to the wheels.
local: 用于设置应用于载具轮的制动级别的数字输入。

en: Receives power generated by an engine to control forward and backward rotation.
local: 接收发动机产生的控制前后旋转的动力。

en: Detects if wheels are slipping resulting in reduced torque.
local: 检测载具轮是否打滑导致扭矩减小。

en: When activated, emits a continuous transponder signal that can be detected over great distances by any transponder locator.
local: 当激活时，发射连续的应答信号，任何定位器都能够在长距离内检测到此信号。

en: An emergency search and rescue transponder.
local: 一个应急用搜救应答器

en: Emit a continuous transponder signal when active.
local: 当激活时发射连续应答信号

en: Detects all transponder signals over great distances. Outputs the strongest signal strength detected, transponder signal strengths will decrease with distance.
local: 在长距离内检测所有的应急信号，信号会随距离衰减，输出检测到最强的信号。

en: An emergency search and rescue transponder locator.
Emits a periodic boolean pulse, with a frequency determined by the distance to the nearest transponder signal.
local: 输出一个周期性二进制脉冲，频率取决于检测到最近的应急信标的距离。

en: Detects any transponder signals when active.
local: 当激活时检测任何应急信号。

en: An on/off signal controls engine startup. The throttle input takes a standard value between -1 and 1 and controls the forward and backward force of connected components. The engine's maximum power output is split between connected components.

en: Turbine engine that can be connected to powered components.

en: The power supplied by the engine for inputting to other components.

local: 控制发动机前进/后退油门的-1和1之间的标准值。

en: An Impeller that will force fluid through the system when torque is applied.
local: 当有扭矩输入时能够强制将流体从一端泵向另一端

en: An Impeller Pump that can push fluid through a system.
local: 叶轮将流体从一端泵向另一端

en: An Impeller that will force fluid through the system when torque is applied.

local: 用于创建轮胎堆栈和挡泥板。

en: The cannon is a turret and can rotate on 2 axis.
local: 一个炮塔，可以在2轴上旋转。

en: A fluid cannon that fires pressurized water for putting out fires.
local: 一种流体大炮，用来发射加压水来灭火。

en: Yaw axis servo control for the cannon head.
Pitch axis servo control for the cannon head.
The fluid input to output from the nozzle. Filters to water only.
local: 从喷嘴输入到输出的流体。只过滤水。

en: This can be used to transport water between Two bodies. Two on/off signals are used to control whether the hose is moving up (towards the base) or down (away from the base). A number output allows you to measure the hose's current length if necessary. The maximum length of the hose is 16 metres (64 blocks). The speed of the hose mechanism can be configured by selecting this component with the select tool.
local: 这可以用来在两个物体之间运输水。两个开/关信号用于控制软管是向上移动(朝向底座)还是向下移动(远离底座)。数字输出允许您在必要时测量软管的当前长度。软管的最大长度为16米(64块)。软管机构的速度可以通过使用选择工具选择此组件来配置。

en: A building block attached to the end of a mechanical hose that can be raised and lowered.
local: 连接在可伸缩的机械软管末端的方块。

en: Fluid connection for the hose coil.
Raises the hose up when receiving an on signal.
local: 接收到接通信号时，将软管向上提起。

en: Lowers the hose down when receiving an on signal.
local: 当接收到接通信号时，收起软管。

en: The current length of the hose in metres.
Fluid connection for the end of the hose.
Place the port inside of an enclosed volume to connect to that volume, or outside of the vehicle to connect to the ocean.
local: 将端口放在封闭卷的内部以连接收到该卷，或放在载具外部以连接收到海洋。

en: Port used to allow fluid in and out of a fluid system.
local: 允许流体进出流体系统的端口。

en: Allows fluid to flow in and out of an enclosed volume or the ocean.
local: 允许流体进出封闭的体积或海洋。

en: Converts mechanical power and water into a high power jet for generating thrust.
local: 将机械功率和水转换成大功率喷射器以产生推力。

en: A fluid impeller and jet nozzle for ocean propulsion.
local: 用于海洋推进的流体叶轮和喷嘴。

en: Mechanical power input to power jet.
local: 动力喷射的机械动力输入。

en: Vertical nozzle angle to control jet direction.
local: 垂直喷嘴角度控制喷射方向。
左铲斗偏转(Roll)器控制输入。
右铲斗偏转(Roll)器控制输入。

en: This will output a quantity in litres and the total capacity in litres. If not inside an enclosed volume, it will give the height relative to the water surface.
local: 这将输出以升为单位的量和以升为单位的总容量。如果不在封闭体积内，它将给出相对于水面的高度。

en: A device to measure how much fluid is within an enclosed volume.
local: 一种测量一个封闭容积内流体含量的装置。

en: Returns the number of litres in an enclosed volume, or height relative to water if not enclosed.
local: 返回封闭体积中的升数，如果未封闭，则返回相对于水的高度。

en: Returns the total capacity of an enclosed volume in litres, or 0 if not enclosed.
local: 返回封闭体积的总容量(以升为单位)，如果未封闭，则返回0.

en: The angle of spray can be adjusted.

en: Locks the wheel into place when receiving an on signal.
local: 接收到接通信号时，将载具轮锁定到位。

This is a flat window that will sit flush with walls and ceilings. 1 block wide.
local: 这是一扇平窗，与墙壁和天花板齐平。1个单位宽。

en: This is a flat window that will sit flush with walls and ceilings. 3 blocks wide.
local: 这是一扇平窗，与墙壁和天花板齐平。3个单位宽。

en: This is a pyramid window that takes up 1 block.
local: 这是一个锥形窗，占用1个单位。

en: This is a wedge window that takes up 1 block.
local: 这是一个楔形窗，占用1个单位。

en: This is a flat window that will sit flush with walls and ceilings. 3 blocks wide.
local: 这是一扇平窗，与墙壁和天花板齐平。3个单位宽。

en: This is a flat window that will sit flush with walls and ceilings. 2 blocks wide.
local: 这是一扇平窗，与墙壁和天花板齐平。2个单位宽。

en: This is a flat window that will sit flush with walls and ceilings. 3 blocks wide.
local: 这是一扇平窗，与墙壁和天花板齐平。3个单位宽。

en: Useful for creating corners between angled and regular windows.
local: 用于在斜窗和常规窗之间创建角点。

en: Large corner windows are triangular in shape, making them useful for creating corners between angled windows.
local: 大的角窗是三角形的，这使得它们可以在角窗之间创建角。

en: This is a flat window that will sit flush with walls and ceilings. 3 blocks wide.
local: 这是一扇平窗，与墙壁和天花板齐平。3个单位宽。

en: A sloped window that can be effectively combined with corner windows to create cockpits and windscreens. 3 blocks wide.
local: 可与角窗有效结合以形成驾驶舱和挡风玻璃的斜窗。3个单位宽。

en: This is a flat window that will sit flush with walls and ceilings. 1 block wide.
local: 这是一扇平窗，与墙壁和天花板齐平。1个单位宽。

en: A sloped window that can be effectively combined with corner windows to create cockpits and windscreens. 1 block wide.
local: 可与角窗有效结合以形成驾驶舱和挡风玻璃的斜窗。1个单位宽。

en: Useful for aircraft and ships that suit small structural windows.
local: 适用于适合小型结构窗户的飞机和船舶。

en: 3x3 window piece with a thick frame.
Useful for large vehicles that require windows with a more robust appearance.
local: 适用于需要具有更坚固外观的载具窗的大型载具。

en: Large 3x5 window piece with a thick frame.
A sloped window that can be used for creating cockpits and windscreens. Can also be used to create a corner between flat windows when oriented correctly.
local: 可以用来制造驾驶舱和挡风玻璃的斜窗。也可用于在正确定向时在平面窗之间创建角点。

en: The sensor outputs the wind direction relative to the orientation of the base of the sensor (in number of turns from -0.5 to 0.5) and the wind speed in m/s. Wind data is relative to the speed of the sensor and only measures wind in the plane of the sensor.
local: 传感器输出相对于传感器底座方向的风向(从-0.5到0.5的圈数)和风速(以m/s为单位)。风数据与传感器速度相关，仅测量传感器平面内的风。

en: A wind sensor for measuring relative wind speed and direction.
local: 测量相对风速和风向的风力传感器。

en: The direction of the wind relative to the component.
Wing surface to provide lift and cut through the air.
local: 机翼表面提供升力并穿过气体。

en: The wing surface cuts through the air while resisting movement against the flat plane of its surface. The aerofoil section also provides lift.
local: 机翼表面穿透气体，同时抵抗其表面平面的运动。机翼部分也提供升力。

en: An air intake component that performs better at higher velocity.
local: 在高速下表现更好的进气口组件

en: Pressing [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] will equip/store the selected item. Press [$[action_equipment_use]] to reload any unloaded flaregun in the players inventory. This equipment has a limited uses, picking up additional boxes of flaregun ammo will replenish these uses. This equipment can be stored on the belt when not in use.
local: 按下 [$[action_interact_left]]/[$[action_interact_right]] 能装备/收起选中物品。按下 [$[action_equipment_use]] 来给在库存中没有装弹的鱼叉枪装上弹药。有着有限使用次数，拿起其他鱼叉枪弹药能够补充使用次数。不使用时可以挂在腰上。

en: A small equipment storage unit containing a box flaregun ammo.
local: 小型装备架，存储一盒鱼叉枪弹药

en: Are you sure you want to test this mission in the world?\n\nYour mission will be automatically despawned when you return to the mission editor.
local: 你确定要在世界中测试这个任务吗？\n\n当您返回任务编辑器时，您的任务将自动取消。

en: Enable time/weather control menu, mission editor, mission spawn menu.
local: 启用时间/天气控制菜单，任务编辑器，任务生成菜单。

en:
You are currently testing a mission.

Returning to the mission editor will despawn all vehicles and objects associated with the mission.

Are you sure you want to return to the mission editor?
local:
您当前正在测试任务。

返回任务编辑器将销毁与任务相关的所有载具和对象。

确实要返回任务编辑器吗？

en: Click the sleep button to fast-forward to your next mission.
local: 单击“睡眠”按钮让时间快进到下一个任务。

en: Your playlist has errors that must be fixed in order to upload to the workshop:\n\n
local: 您的游玩列表中有错误，必须修复这些错误才能上传到创意工坊：\ n\n

en: Your playlist has failed to upload to the Steam workshop.
local: 您的游玩列表未能上传到Steam创意工坊。

en: Your workshop playlist has failed to update.
local: 您的创意工坊游玩列表更新失败。

en:
Your playlist was successfully uploaded to the Steam workshop.

 We recommend heading to your playlist's workshop page to add more information about the mission(s) you've included.

 Any vehicles used in your mission(s) have been included as part of the upload. Players will not need to separately subscribe to any of these vehicles.
local:
您的游玩列表已成功上传到Steam创意工坊。

我们建议您转到游玩列表的创意工坊页，以添加已包含的任务的详细信息。

已将任务中使用的所有载具作为上传的一部分包括在内。玩家不需要单独订阅这些载具。

en: Your playlist was updated successfully.\n\nYou can customise the changelog for this update by heading to your playlist's workshop page to let your subscribers know what's new.
local: 您的游玩列表已成功更新。\n\n您可以通过进入游玩列表的创意工坊页面，让您的订阅者了解最新情况，来自定义此更新的更改日志。
此游玩列表包括以下内容

en: Please note that some missions in this playlist will only naturally spawn if certain criteria are met(such as owning a specific type of island, or having unlocked fire equipment).
local: 请注意，此游玩列表中的某些任务只有在满足某些条件(例如拥有特定类型的岛屿或拥有未锁定的消防设备)时才会自然生成。

en: The author of this playlist has tagged it as creative, so some or all included missions may be unsuitable for career mode.
local: 此游玩列表的作者已将其标记为创造性，因此某些或所有包含的任务可能不适合生涯模式。

en: (If you are the author of this playlist, you can edit this description to add more details)
local: (如果您是此游玩列表的作者，则可以编辑此描述以添加更多详细信息)

en: Playlist has no missions or Environment Mods
local: 游玩列表没有任务或环境模式
您保存的任务游玩列表。

en: Mission playlists you've subscribed to on the Steam Workshop.
local: 您在Steam创意工坊上订阅的任务游玩列表。

en: Official mission playlists created by the Stormworks Devs.
local: 由Stormworks开发人员创建的官方任务列表。

en: Share your mission playlist with other players on the Steam Workshop.
local: 在Steam创意工坊上与其他玩家共享您的任务游玩列表。

en: Overwrite your mission playlist and publish your changes to the Steam Workshop.
local: 覆盖任务游玩列表并将更改发布到Steam创意工坊。
创建新的任务游玩列表。
加载保存的任务游玩列表。

en: Save the currently edited mission playlist.
local: 保存当前编辑的任务游玩列表。
查看当前编辑的游玩列表。
编辑当前游玩列表的位置。

en: Env Mod Zones are persistent zones, they can be used to set up advanced mission behaviour at specific world locations and can be manipulated from playlist Lua. These zones can be accessed globally by any playlist script with functions getZones() and isInZone().
local: 环境MOD区域是永久性区域，它们可以用来在特定的世界位置设置高级任务行为，并且可以通过Playlist Lua进行操作。这些区域可以通过任何Playlist脚本使用函数getZones()和isInZone()进行全局访问。

en: Zones are used to specify a location, these zones are local to a playlist and can be accessed like any other local component through getLocationObjectData(). Mission Zones are generally more appropriate for constructing procedural style missions.
local: 区域用于指定一个位置，这些区域是playlist的地点，可以像其他本地组件一样通过getLocationObjectData()来访问。任务区一般更适合构建流程式的任务。

en: Are you sure you want to create a new mission playlist?
local: 是否确实要创建新的任务游玩列表？

en: Enter a save name for this mission playlist:
local: 输入此任务游玩列表的保存名称：

en: Are you sure you want to delete this mission playlist?
local: 是否确实要删除此任务游玩列表？

en: Are you sure you want to overwrite this mission playlist?
local: 是否确实要覆盖此任务游玩列表？

en: Are you sure you want to upload this mission playlist to the workshop?\n\n This will make it available to all Stormworks players.
local: 是否确实要将此任务游玩列表上传到创意工坊？\n\n这将使所有Stormworks玩家都可以使用它。

en: This objective will remain inactive until its dependent objectives are complete. It will fail if its dependencies cannot be met. Use this to create multi-stage missions with branching objectives. Inactive objectives are not visible to the player.
local: 此目标将保持不活动状态，直到其从属目标完成。如果无法满足其依赖关系，它将失败。使用此项创建具有分支目标的多阶段任务。不活动的目标对玩家不可见。

en: Mission playlists you've uploaded to the Steam Workshop.
local: 你上传到Steam创意工坊的任务游玩列表。

en: No mission selected. Select a mission in the playlist overview to begin editing.
local: 未选择任务。在游玩列表概览中选择任务以开始编辑。

en: Attach a manifold to a cylinder to provide connections for air, fuel, and exhaust for that cylinder. Cylinders that are chained directly adjacent to each other can share a single manifold.
local: 将歧管连接到气缸上，为该气缸提供气体、燃料和排气的连接。彼此直接相邻的气缸可以共用一个歧管。
一个模块化的发动机歧管。

en:
First, connect the button in front of seat to the engine's 'on/off' node.

This will allow you to switch the engine on by pressing the button.

Click on one of the flashing logic nodes to select it and then drag and release while hovering over the node you want to connect it to.
local:
首先，将座椅前面的按钮连接收到引擎的“开/关”节点。

这将允许您通过按按钮打开引擎。

单击其中一个闪烁的逻辑节点将其选中，然后在悬停在要连接的节点上时将其拖动并释放。

en:
Next, connect the 'Axis 2 [$[action_up]]/[$[action_down]]' node from the seat to the engine's 'throttle in' node.

This will allow you to apply throttle power to the engine by pressing [$[action_up]] and [$[action_down]].

Click on one of the flashing logic nodes to select it and then drag and release while hovering over the node you want to connect it to.
local:
接下来，将“轴2[$[action_up]/[$[action_down]]节点从座椅连接收到发动机的“throttle in”节点。

这将允许您通过按[$[action_up]]和[$[action_down]]向发动机应用油门功率。

单击其中一个闪烁的逻辑节点将其选中，然后在悬停在要连接的节点上时将其拖放去吧。

en: Next, connect the 'Axis 1 [$[action_left]]/[$[action_right]]' node from the seat to one rudder's 'rotation input' node.\n\nThis will allow you to apply a turning force by pressing [$[action_left]] or [$[action_right]].
local: 接下来，将座椅上的“轴1[$[action_left]/[$[action_right]]'节点连接收到一个方向舵的“旋转输入”节点。\n\n这将允许您通过按[$[action_left]]或[$[action_right]]来应用旋转力。

en: Next, connect the 'Axis 1 [$[action_left]]/[$[action_right]]' node from the seat to the the 'rotation input' node in the second rudder.\n\nThis will allow you to apply a turning force by pressing [$[action_left]] or [$[action_right]].
local: 接下来，将座椅上的“轴1[$[action_left]/[$[action_right]]'节点连接收到第二个方向舵上的“旋转输入”节点。\n\n这将允许您通过按[$[action_left]]或[$[action_right]]应用旋转力。

en: Finally, connect the power between the engine and propeller.\n\nThis will pass the power created by the engine through to the propeller and allow you to move the boat forward and back with the throttle.
local: 最后，连接发动机和螺旋桨之间的电源。\n\n这将把发动机产生的电源传递到螺旋桨上，并允许您使用油门前后移动船。

en: This is the vehicle editor, where you can fix your boat.
local: 这是载具编辑器，你可以在这里修理你的船。

en: You can rotate the camera around in the vehicle editor by holding the RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON while dragging, or by holding [shift] and LEFT MOUSE BUTTON.
local: 拖动时按住鼠标右键，或按住[shift]和鼠标左键，可以在载具编辑器中旋转摄像头。

en: Nuclear power plant with dock, reactor rooms and underground disposal pool.
local: 带有码头、反应堆室和地下废料池的核电站。

en: Small fishing village with mountain, multiple sea stacks and a rocky peninsula.
local: 小渔村，有山，多个海蚀柱和岩石半岛屿。

en: Large quarry with mine, natural rock bridge and small castle ruin.
local: 大型采石场，带有矿山、天然岩桥和小城堡遗址。

en: Rocky coastline with small cave, ancient ruin and sheltered beach.
local: 岩石海岸线，有小山洞，古老的遗迹和隐蔽的海滩。

en: Sheltered cove, ancient ruin, cliff face connected by natural arch.
local: 隐蔽的海湾，古老的废墟，悬崖面由自然拱门连接。

en: An oil platform built on the edge of the Arctic mainland, with road access to a train terminal.
local: 一个建在北极大陆边缘的石油平台，有通往火载具站的公路。

en: An Arctic research outpost, large inland lake and train terminal with road access.
local: 北极研究前哨，大型内陆湖和火载具站，有公路通道。

en: A large island complete with dock and airstrip, both featuring with two workbenches.
local: 一个大型岛屿，配有码头和简易机场，均配有两个工作台。

en: Please note that some missions in this playlist will only naturally spawn if certain criteria are met(such as owning a specific type of island, or having unlocked fire equipment).
local: 请注意，此游玩列表中的某些任务只有在满足某些条件(例如拥有特定类型的岛屿或拥有未锁定的消防设备)时才会自然生成。

en: The author of this playlist has tagged it as creative, so some or all included missions may be unsuitable for career mode.
local: 此游玩列表的作者已将其标记为创造性，因此某些或所有包含的任务可能不适合生涯模式。

en: (If you are the author of this playlist, you can edit this description to add more details)
local: (如果您是此游玩列表的作者，则可以编辑此描述以添加更多详细信息)

en: No missions available. Sleep in a bed to fast-forward, or click the (+) button to manually spawn a mission.
local: 没有任务可用。睡在床上快进时间，或单击“+”按钮手动生成任务。

en: Survival difficulty with reduced starting money, locked to first person view, no fast travel or vehicle teleporting, limited fuel.
local: 生存困难与启动资金减少，锁定第一人称，没有快速旅行或载具传送，有限的燃料。

en: You can customise outfits and whether this character is a survivor or NPC in the properties window. Survivors will follow you and can be picked up, but NPCs can not be interacted with.
local: 你可以在属性窗口中定制装备以及这个角色是幸存者还是NPC。幸存者将跟随你并且可以被捡起，但是NPC不能被交互。

en: Objects can be picked up, thrown and moved around by the player. They can be used for delivery missions or just as decoration. You can customise the object type in the properties window.
local: 玩家可以捡起、投掷和移动物体。它们可以用于运输任务或仅仅作为装饰。可以在“属性”窗口中自定义对象类型。

en: Env Mod Zones are persistent zones, they can be used to set up advanced mission behaviour at specific world locations and can be manipulated from playlist Lua. These zones can be accessed globally by any playlist script with functions getZones() and isInZone().
local: 环境MOD区域是永久性区域，它们可以用来在特定的世界位置设置高级任务行为，并且可以通过Playlist Lua进行操作。这些区域可以通过任何Playlist脚本使用函数getZones()和isInZone()进行全局访问。

en: Zones are used to specify a location, these zones are local to a playlist and can be accessed like any other local component through getLocationObjectData(). Mission Zones are generally more appropriate for constructing procedural style missions.
local: 区域用于指定一个位置，这些区域是playlist的地点，可以像其他本地组件一样通过getLocationObjectData()来访问。任务区一般更适合构建流程式的任务。

en: You can set a vehicle to be static in the properties window. Static vehicles are fixed in place, making them useful for adding buildings or cranes to missions.
local: 可以在“属性”窗口中将载具设置为静态。静态载具被固定在一个位置，这使得它们有助于在任务中增加建筑或机械臂。

en: Vehicle buttons allow your mission to interact with a named button on a vehicle. You must parent the button to a vehicle, and set the 'button display name' in the properties window to be the name of a button on the parent vehicle.
local: 载具按钮允许您的任务与载具上的指定按钮交互。必须将按钮设置为载具的父级，并将“属性”窗口中的“按钮显示名称”设置为父级载具上按钮的名称。

en: The animal type can be customised in the properties window. If the 'Sharks' difficulty option is enabled, sharks will stalk and attack characters in the water.
local: 可以在“属性”窗口中自定义动物类型。如果启用“鲨鱼”难度选项，鲨鱼将跟踪并攻击水中的角色。

en:
Are you sure you want to update the selected microcontroller with this schematic?

- If you have resized the schematic, some components may be removed to make room for the new microcontroller.
- If you have moved or changed any logic inputs/outputs, some logic links may not be preserved.
local:
是否确实要用此示意图更新选定的微控制器？

-如果调整了原理图的大小，则可能会删除某些组件以为新微控制器腾出空间。
-如果移动或更改了任何逻辑输入/输出，则可能无法保留某些逻辑链接。

en: You are missing some components in this vehicle, they have been removed:\n
local: 您没有此载具中的某些组件，这些组件已被删除：\ n

en: Some components do not fit or may be overlapping, they have been removed:\n
local: 某些组件不匹配或可能重叠，它们已被删除：\n

en: This vehicle was built with the 'Advanced Vehicles' difficulty option enabled.\n\nYou are currently playing with Advanced Vehicles disabled, so this vehicle may not function correctly or at all without modification.
local: 此载具是在启用“高级载具”困难选项的情况下制造的。\n\n您当前正在禁用高级载具，因此此载具可能无法正常工作，或者根本无法进行修改。

en: This vehicle was built with the 'Advanced Vehicles' difficulty option disabled.\n\nYou are currently playing with Advanced Vehicles enabled, so this vehicle may not function correctly or at all without modification.
local: 此载具是在禁用“高级载具”困难选项的情况下制造的。\n\n您当前正在使用启用的高级载具进行游戏，因此此载具可能无法正常工作，或者根本无法进行修改。

en: Your microcontroller was successfully uploaded to the Steam workshop.\n\nWe recommend heading to your microcontroller's workshop page to add a description, screenshots, and usage instructions.
local: 您的微控制器已成功上传到Steam创意工坊。\n\n我们建议您转到微控制器的创意工坊页以添加说明、屏幕截图和使用说明。

en: Upload your microcontroller to the Steam Workshop, or update a previous upload.
local: 将微控制器上传到Steam创意工坊，或更新以前的上传。

en: Transmission pipes, fuel requirement, advanced engine mechanics.
local: 传动管道、载具燃料需求、高级发动机原理。

en: Enable time/weather control menu, mission editor, mission spawn menu.
local: 启用时间/天气控制菜单，任务编辑器，任务生成菜单。

en: Features a hangar, large dock, and runway.
local: 设有机库、大型码头和跑道。

en: A small military establishment with a hangar, barracks and runway.
local: 有机库、兵营和跑道的小型军事设施。

en: Features a large cave with water access, and a large area for base construction.
local: 有一个大洞穴，可以通水，还有一个大面积的基地建设。

en: An inaccessible plateau, perfect for landing helicopters or base construction.
local: 不可接近的高原，非常适合降落直升机或基地建设。

en: A weathered bank ideal for docking large boats, with a flat area for base construction.
local: 一个风化的堤岸，非常适合停靠大型船只，有一个平坦的地基。

en: The base of a large, disused oil rig, ready for building a new platform.
local: 一个废弃的大型石油钻井平台的底座，准备建造一个新的平台。

en: Upload your vehicle to the Steam Workshop, or update a previous upload.
local: 将您的载具上传到Steam创意工坊，或更新以前的上传。

en: Merge two vehicle bodies. Different bodies are denoted by different colours. Click on a body to select it, then click an adjacent one to merge them.
local: 合并两个载具。不同的物体用不同的颜色表示。单击一个实体将其选中，然后单击相邻的实体将其合并。

en: Select parts of your vehicle to cut, copy, paste, rotate, flip and move them around. Export a selection as a new vehicle, or import a saved subassembly to place on your vehicle.
local: 选择要切割、复制、粘贴、旋转、翻转和移动的载具部件。将选定内容导出为新载具，或导入保存的部件以放置在载具上。

en: Upload a new vehicle to the steam workshop, or select one of your existing workshop vehicles to edit and overwrite it
local: 将新载具上传到steam创意工坊，或选择一辆现有的创意工坊载具进行编辑和覆盖

en: Lua scripting gives you the tools to create advanced logic components using the Lua scripting language. Stormworks provides a number of functions to allow your script to interface with your vehicle's logic system, as well as drawing to in-game monitors.\n\nThis guide outlines the functions that are available for use in your scripts but it is not a comprehensive tutorial on using the Lua language.
local:
Lua脚本提供了使用Lua脚本语言创建高级逻辑组件的工具。Stormworks提供了许多功能，允许脚本与载具的逻辑系统进行交互，并绘制到游戏中的屏幕中。

本指南概述了可在脚本中使用的功能，但它不是使用Lua语言的综合系统性教程。

显示器中的绘图均以左上角为坐标原点，向右为X轴正方向，向下为Y轴正方向。文字的坐标为其左上角像素点的坐标值。

游戏中一个单位长度为32个像素，即：

屏幕1x1=32x32像素；

屏幕2x2=64x64像素；

屏幕5x3=160x96像素；

屏幕9x5=288x160像素；

HUD（小）=32x32像素；

HUD（大）=96x96像素。

en: Draw line from (x1, y1) to (x2, y2).
Draw circle at (x, y) with radius.
local: 在(x，y)处画一定半径的空心圆。

en: Draw filled circle at (x, y) with radius.
local: 在(x，y)处画一定半径的实心圆。

en: Draw rectangle at (x, y) with width and height.
local: 在(x，y)处绘制一定宽高的空心矩形。

en: Draw filled rectangle at (x, y) with width and height.
local: 在(x，y)处绘制一定宽高的填充矩形。

en: Draw triangle between (x1, y1), (x2, y2) and (x3, y3).
local: 在(x1，y1)，(x2，y2)和(x3，y3)之间绘制空心三角形。

en: Draw filled triangle between (x1, y1), (x2, y2) and (x3, y3).
local: 在(x1，y1)，(x2，y2)和(x3，y3)之间绘制填充三角形。

en: Draw text at (x, y). Each character is 4 pixels wide and 5 pixels tall.
local: 在(x，y)处绘制文本。每个字符宽4像素，高5像素。

en: Draw text within the rectangle at (x, y) with width and height. Text alignment can be specified using the last two parameters and ranges from -1 to 1 (left to right, top to bottom). If either of the alignment parameters are omitted, the text will be drawn top-left by default. Text will automatically wrap at spaces when possible, and will overflow the top/bottom of the specified rectangle if too large.
local: 在矩形内绘制宽度和高度为(x，y)的文本。文本对齐可以使用最后两个参数指定，范围从-1到1(从左到右，从上到下)。如果忽略任何一个对齐参数，则默认情况下文本将绘制在左上角。如果可能，文本将自动换行，如果太大，文本将溢出指定矩形的顶部/底部。

en: Draw the world map centred on map coordinate (x,y) with zoom level ranging from 0.1 to 50.
local: 绘制以地图坐标(x，y)为中心的世界地图，缩放级别从0.1到50.

en: Set the colours used for rendering the map. Values range from 0 - 255, alpha is optional.
local: 设置用于渲染地图的颜色。值的范围是0-255，alpha是可选的。

en:
The following global lua functions are available:

- pairs
- ipairs
- next
- tostring
- tonumber

and additional functions are available through the following lua libraries:

- math
- table
- string

For full documentation of the functions provided by these libraries, visit https://www.lua.org/manual/.
local:
以下全局lua函数可用：\ n
-pairs
-ipairs
-next
-tostring
-tonumber

其他函数可通过以下lua库使用：\ n
-math
-table
-string

有关这些库提供的函数的完整文档，请访问https://www。lua。org/manual/。

en:
The following global async functions are available:

- httpGet

HTTP requests are sent to the localhost on the specified port. Responses are caught with the httpReply(port, request_body, response_body) callback function.

async.httpGet(port, request_body)

Example of a HTTP request sent to port 80:
local:
可以使用以下全局异步函数：

-httpGet

HTTP请求被发送到指定端口上的本地主机。使用httpReply（端口，request_body，response_body）回调函数捕获响应。

async.httpGet（端口，request_body）

[译者注:此函数使用可以参考本人B站视频:BV1mV411B7Bg] 

发送到端口80的HTTP请求示例：

en:
This scripting API is very powerful and as such there are some important reminders to take note of:

- Your script has a max execution time of 1000 milliseconds, however it is still possible to create scripts that significantly slow down the game. It is your responsibility to ensure your script runs efficiently.

- Random number functions are provided by the Lua math library. Use of randomness in your scripts is likely to cause desync in multiplayer, so use these functions at your own risk.

- When your vehicle despawns and respawns, your script will be executed 'fresh' and any state stored within the script will be lost. We recommend keeping your script as stateless as possible, and making use of existing logic components (e.g. memory register) to store values that you wish to persist.

- Your scripts run as a 'black box' with only the logic inputs/outputs being synced in multiplayer. Keep in mind that complex logic in your script may behave differently for different players in a multiplayer session.

- A number of safeguards are in place to sandbox your script, however it is still possible to write scripts that will potentially crash your game. If you crash your game with a script, it's likely that you're doing something (very) wrong. This is your own responsibility. If you suspect you have encountered a legitimate bug, please report it on the Stormworks issue tracker (accessible from the pause-menu).

- Malicious and harmful scripts will not be tolerated on the Stormworks Steam Workshop.

Finally, enjoy the almost limitless possibilities that these scripts provide. This short wiki aims to give a good overview of how scripting in Stormworks works, however if you have any questions that are not covered here, please feel free to join us on Discord (accessible from the pause-menu)!
local:
这个脚本API非常强大，因此有一些重要的提示需要注意：\ n
-您的脚本的最大执行时间为1000毫秒，但是仍然可以创建显著减慢游戏速度的脚本。确保脚本有效运行是您的责任。

-Lua数学库提供随机数函数。在脚本中使用随机性可能会在多人游戏中导致desync，因此使用这些功能的风险由您自己承担。

-当您的载具报废和重生时，您的脚本将被“刷新”执行，脚本中存储的任何状态都将丢失。我们建议尽可能使脚本保持无状态，并使用现有的逻辑组件(例如内存寄存器)来存储希望保持的值。

-脚本作为“黑盒”运行，只有逻辑输入/输出在多人游戏中同步。请记住，脚本中的复杂逻辑对于多人会话中的不同玩家可能会有不同的行为。

-有许多保护措施可以对脚本进行沙箱处理，但是仍然可以编写可能会导致游戏崩溃的脚本。如果你用脚本把游戏搞崩溃了，你(很)可能写错了什么。这是你自己的责任。如果怀疑遇到了游戏本身的错误，请在Stormworks问题跟踪程序(可从“暂停”菜单访问)上报告。

-Stormworks Steam创意工坊不允许恶意和有害的脚本。

最后，享受这些脚本提供的几乎无限的可能性。这个简短的wiki旨在很好地概述Stormworks中的脚本是如何工作的，但是如果您有任何此处未涉及的问题，请随时加入我们的Discord(可从暂停菜单访问)！

en: An uncontrolled blaze has sprung up, decimating the natural scenery.
local: 一场无法控制的大火突然爆发，破坏了自然环境。

en: There is already a vehicle in the edit zone, are you sure you would like to spawn this vehicle?
local: 编辑区域已经存在一台载具了,确定要在此之上继续生成吗?
正在将游戏保存到自动保存...

en: Cargo Zones are mission zones that can only be spawned as environment mods, they can be used to set up advanced mission behaviour at specific world locations.
local: 货物区是环境mods产生的任务区域，它们可以用来在指定地点构建高级任务行为。

en: Zones are used to specify a drop-off or target location for an objective. e.g. the delivery zone for a cargo transport mission.
local: 区域用于指定目标的放置位置或目标位置。e、 货物运输任务的运送区。

en: Career mode. Expand your coastguard empire. Complete missions to earn money and upgrade your vehicles.
local: 生涯模式，扩张你的海岸警卫队帝国，完成任务来获得收入升级你的载具。

en: Creative mode. A sandbox environment with all components unlocked and unlimited resources available.
local: 创造模式。沙盒模式，所有组件都已解锁，并且可用资源不受限制。

en: Career mode. Expand your coastguard empire. Complete missions to unlock components and money.
local: 生涯模式。扩展你的海岸警卫队帝国。完成解锁组件和资金的任务。

en: This game is in active development and will contain bugs.\nAll features subject to change. Game saves may not function in future versions.
local: 此游戏正在积极开发中，可能包含bug。\n所有功能可能会更改。游戏存档在未来版本中可能不可用。\n 个人汉化更新日期2020/8/29 By:BKN。
所有组件蓝图都已解锁。
在高级载具模式下可用

local: 退出编辑器。这将退还所有使用过的部件和资金。

en: Discard any changes and start a new vehicle. This will refund any used components and money.
local: 放弃任何更改并启动新载具。这将退还所有使用过的部件和资金。

en: Extinguish the wildfire before is gets out of control.

local: 没有使用工作台的权限！

local: 从发动机接收到的功率影响所产生的前进和后退力。这个螺旋桨只能在水下工作。

en: A titan class propeller for ships.
Receives power generated by an engine.
local: 接收发动机产生的能量。
